During this period, the Dragon Nest Tribe focused on strengthening the training of the tribe’s Beastmen, mainly to enhance their prowess.
Time passed in tranquility, with about half a month remaining until the end of the cold winter.
Meanwhile, Austin, who was contemplating the four Law Divine Swords, encountered a seemingly insurmountable obstacle before even entering the gate.
At the mountaintop,
lightning flashed and thunder roared, winds and thunder converged.
Austin’s face showed a distressed look.
"Wind, Thunder, Water, Fire, Power of the Four Symbols, sigh..."
Between heaven and earth, the Qi of the four Law Divine Swords dispersed into the void, intertwining mysteriously, seemingly possessing a faint, almost intangible connection.
This intertwining of Qi formed an incomparably harmonious "circle," seemingly excluding the surrounding miles from heaven and earth.
This was the power at the level of Laws, where the Laws were affecting the void.
The surrounding miles of territory were transformed into a domain belonging to them!
If one could comprehend the rationale behind the mutual intertwining of the Qi of these four Law Divine Swords, it could serve as the foundation for developing a Four Spirits Sword Array akin to the Four Directions Sword Realm.
Austin thought this at the beginning, and with great hope, he invested a significant amount of his heart spirit into it.
He infused his spiritual power into the Thunderbolt Divine Sword he was most familiar with, merging into its aura and spreading into the void, intending to observe how this aura of Laws intertwined.
But, he failed from the start.
The four Law Divine Swords seemed to possess consciousness. When Austin attempted to glimpse at their true condition, the connections and intertwining of those auras ceased immediately.
The Law Divine Swords stood quietly around, their might shaking the surroundings, opposing each other as if dividing four realms, making the previous mystical intertwining seem like an illusion.
When Austin withdrew his spiritual power, the intertwining of those auras and the harmonious circle reappeared.
First came astonishment, followed by shock, and, finally, a relentless determination.
He continued to attempt,
first once, then twice, and so it went.
Thus, Austin abandoned the Thunderbolt Divine Sword and focused his spiritual power on the Wind Law Divine Sword.
However, the result was the same!
Just as when he merged his spiritual power into the Thunderbolt Divine Sword and tried to trace the aura of the Thunder Law to understand the connection and intertwining principles between the four Laws, those connections vanished as soon as he observed them.
When Austin infused his spiritual power into the aura of the Wind Law, the result was identical.
Next, it was the Law of Water.
And finally, the Law of Fire.
No matter how Austin tried, as soon as he observed, the connections between the four Laws inevitably vanished.
The four Law Divine Swords were like four mischievous children.
When you’re not looking, they get along very well, playing and having fun together.
But as soon as you look at them, they immediately become proper, as if they don’t recognize each other.
Strange, very strange.
"Quantum superposition state..."
Austin’s expression turned grim, pondering for a long time, and he used a term from physics he encountered in a previous life to describe the situation he faced.
Just like Schrödinger’s cat.
Before you observe it, that cat exists in a state of being both alive and dead at the same time.
The four Law Divine Swords before him were just like this.
While being independent, they were also interconnected.
In a state of both independence and connection.
"Schrödinger’s cat, an overlay of life and death!"
Austin’s expression became particularly complex.
Back when he was young, upon first hearing about Schrödinger’s cat and roughly understanding the experiment’s process, he simply thought that the so-called superposed states of the cat were:
Living result + dead result = overlay of life and death.
The so-called state of life and death overlay was nothing more than a philosophical, linguistic concept.
The cat in the box was either alive or dead; the result could only be one or the other.
Once the box was opened and the cat inside was observed, confirming the cat’s life or death, it was akin to stepping back from the right side of the equation to the left.
However, it wasn’t until Austin attended university, learned more, that he truly understood that his initial understanding was completely wrong.
The state of overlay between life and death is a real existing state, not just a linguistic equation.
Memory pulled him back continuously.
Austin recalled a real-life experiment that seemed bizarre and frightening to ordinary people, the photon double-slit interference experiment.
In that experiment, when you used detectors to monitor how the photon passed through the two slits, that photon manifested as a particle, and no interference pattern appeared on the photographic paper behind.
Yet when you removed the monitor, a strange phenomenon occurred.
With the same experimental setup and environment, the photographic paper behind displayed an interference pattern at the end.
As if some ghost or deity wielded its invisible hands, altering everything.
And that classic experiment in quantum physics proved that human consciousness could cause the collapse of the quantum superposition states that exist in reality.
This is also why people often say the end of science is theology.
It was from that experiment Austin’s thinking began to change, realizing that Schrödinger’s cat genuinely existed in a state of life and death overlay.
Now, the problem faced by Austin’s four Law Divine Swords might be the same.
"This, perhaps already touches upon the fundamental concepts of world reality and existence!"
Austin shook his head slightly.
The state of independence and connection coexistence of the four Law Divine Swords, Wind, Thunder, Water, and Fire, was so similar to the photon’s double-slit interference experiment!
This problem had already touched upon the fundamentals of the world and reality.
Such a level of power was something Austin could not touch.
Untouchable, incomprehensible.
"Perhaps, only reaching Legendary, or even Epic above Legendary, or the Divine above Epic, could one truly understand the source of such things."
At this moment, Austin couldn’t help but recall the final words of the old priest before he left the Divine Kingdom.
"...a predetermined destiny."
Perhaps that pertained to some deeper information.
After mulling over it for a long time, he came to no conclusions.
In the end, Austin gave up on contemplating these issues.
Though he hadn’t figured out the rationale behind the connections between the four Law Divine Swords, regarding the Four Spirits Sword Array, Austin came away with some ideas during this fruitless contemplation process.

chapters.title: Chapter 311 - 307 Control
chapters.content:
Chapter 311: Chapter 307 Control
Austin had a vague suspicion about the intertwining auras among the four Law Divine Swords.
This level of entities likely involves some rule of the operation of all things in the world, a certain ultimate truth of the operation of heaven and earth.
Or rather, the convergence and operation of Elemental Powers form the cornerstone of the elements of the Prime Material Plane, the foundation of the Prime Material Plane’s existence.
Such fundamental laws of the world’s operation are utterly impossible for him to grasp now, given that he’s only at the Half-Legendary stage.
That Austin could discover such a peculiar phenomenon is mostly due to the inadvertent result triggered by the four Law Divine Swords he had crafted, otherwise, even those in the Legendary Realm couldn’t touch upon such a bizarre phenomenon.
If not, those who have comprehended the Law Origin in the Legendary Realm could use Law to wage heaven-shattering and earth-destroying battles.
If that cornerstone of the Elemental Powers of the world is deciphered and applied to battles, it would be akin to the power of a world-ending and rebirth-like force!
"Even if I know its appearance but not its essence, as long as I can follow a certain track or rule, I should be able to manifest the Four Spirits Sword Array through sheer will."
Just like magic, many do not understand its fundamental principles, yet they can still invoke the Elemental Power to unleash Magic through Spiritual Power.
This was exactly what Austin intended.
The Seta Great World had a certain scientific foundation, yet it was more metaphysical, a truth that Austin had realized when developing the Electromagnetic Cannon in his earlier years.
One must know, even in the world Austin had traversed from, Electromagnetic Cannons practical for battle had not yet been completed.
But he, just by relying on some basic electromagnetic principles, constructed a formidable Electromagnetic Cannon through the metaphysical forces of Spiritual Power and Magic Power.
If the scientists of his former life learned of this, they would likely feel deep anguish.
And so is the Four Spirits Sword Array.
Having been unable to analyze the most fundamental principles of the four Law Divine Swords nor deduce the framework of the Four Spirits Sword Array purely through scientific theory, could they use the strength of Spiritual Power and metaphysical magic to complete the remaining steps?
Thus, in wanting to develop the Four Spirits Sword Array, only the operating environment is required, and there’s no need to delve too deeply into its operational logic.
Upon thinking, Austin acted.
He immersed his Heart Spirit into the four Law Divine Swords, observing the operational connection from afar.
Since he couldn’t analyze the most basic principles, summarizing the external patterns of it should succeed.
For this time, Austin didn’t separate the four Law Divine Swords but observed them as a whole.
Before long, he seemingly saw an "orbit" of operation formed by the virtual energy amongst the four Law Divine Swords.
Sure enough, Austin had found the right direction.
In the realm of quantum physics, the macro and micro perspectives are different.
Unexpectedly, some theories from his previous world could be applied here.
Casting away all excess thoughts, Austin refocused his Heart Spirit on the "whole" formed by the four Law Divine Swords before him, observing meticulously and comprehending the certain "principle" within.
Time ticked away slowly.
While observing and comprehending, Austin also experimented externally using the aural operation patterns formed by the four Law Divine Swords as a whole.
Verifying between what he comprehended and experimented with, he indeed made considerable gains.
For example, the transformation of the Rasengan through three Elemental Attribute Powers.
During the time the Pyramid built by the Undead was destroyed, Austin utilized a supremely invincible world-destroying compressed Wind-Water-Thunder Rasengan formed from the transformation of three attributes: wind, water, and thunder, which evaporated the thousands-meter-high Pyramid, erasing it from the earth.
To think, at that time, Austin had just recently entered the Gold stage!
The Rasengan born from the transformation of three Elemental Powers erupted with exponential power, reaching an incredible stage.
However, later on, Austin never used the supremely invincible world-destroying compressed Wind-Water-Thunder Rasengan in battles again, typically resorting to Rasengan of a single attribute.
Why so?
Because, after the two transformations of the Rasengan’s nature, the difficulty in controlling it exponentially increased as well.
A slight carelessness would cause a conflict of the two Elemental Powers within the Rasengan leading to its collapse.
If two element’s transformation is tricky enough, adding a third Attribute Power only complicates it further.
Precisely why, despite the multi-attribute transforming Rasengan having greater offensive power, in intense battles, it’s nearly impossible to spend much energy on gathering a multi-attribute transforming Rasengan.
Thus, after obliterating the Undead Pyramid, Austin never deployed the supremely invincible world-destroying compressed Wind-Water-Thunder Rasengan again.
The reason being, in intense battles, opportunities pass in the blink of an eye, leaving no room to spend time gathering a killing move.
But now, everything has changed.
As Austin took the integration of the four Law Divine Swords as a whole and comprehended the operation of the four Law Powers, he faintly felt a resonance regarding Elemental Power’s operational linkage.
Like touching upon a certain bottleneck, advancing further.
While comprehending the four Law Divine Swords, Austin reflected and pondered momentarily, his Spiritual Power invoked within the void.
Boom!!!
Suddenly, visible ripples in the void rippled and twisted, transforming into a vortex.
A large amount of Magic Power surged in, forming a Magic Power Rasengan.
Next, the Law Power fluctuated, causing the rapidly spinning attribute-less Magic Power within the Rasengan to transform in nature.
The Wind and Thunder powers completed their transformation in an instant.
"It worked! Indeed, using the concept of Wind and Thunder Dual Swords Unification as a foundation, combined with my understandings these recent times, the Wind-Thunder dual attributes transforming Rasengan can also be instantly triggered."
Gazing at the dual attribute transforming Rasengan he held, Austin exhaled deeply.
It seemed as though eternally small needle-like electric lights converged within the Rasengan spinning rapidly, and the terrifying power contained within the wind-thunder attribute transforming mixed Rasengan warped the surrounding void, causing visible faint ripples to radiate in the air.
The perfect fusion of the dual Attribute Powers within the Rasengan resulted in a convergence nearly quadrupling the power of an ordinary single-attribute transforming Rasengan!
"What a pleasant surprise."
The frustration from previously hitting bottlenecks while comprehending the four Law Divine Swords instantly vanished for Austin.
Being able to instantly unleash a multi-attribute Rasengan in battle meant significantly amplifying his attack power, enhancing his combat capability enormously.
And all of this could only be considered an unforeseen bounty amidst the comprehension of the four Law Divine Swords.

chapters.title: Chapter 312 - 308: Mushroom Cloud
chapters.content:
Chapter 312: Chapter 308: Mushroom Cloud
Austin unexpectedly gained an opportunity to integrate and transform the multi-attribute Rasengan, so he continued to meditate.
Time flowed by, little by little.
The harvest accumulated slowly like raindrops.
Finally, after more than a dozen days, Austin felt he had achieved some insight and began to attempt creating the Four Spirits Sword Array.
First, was to build a relatively stable foundational framework.
This wasn’t considered difficult.
The four Law Divine Swords suspended in the void nearly formed a unified "sphere." What Austin needed to do was like piling bricks and lime on the outer layer of a pre-built house skeleton.
This work took several days of effort before a basic framework was finally constructed.
However, the challenge was how to move forward from here.
The four Law Divine Swords, polished and strengthened by Austin, unfolded in the void, forming merely a prototype enhanced domain. In terms of offensive and defensive capabilities, it still had a long way to go before success.
"What should I do next?"
Austin couldn’t help but fall into contemplation.
...
Just as Austin was painstakingly creating the Four Spirits Sword Array and the Dragon Nest Tribe was steadily developing.
At this moment in the outside world, war had already spread, with blades and fire sweeping across large areas of the Kawa Great Forest.
The Beastman Tribe Alliance’s army finally launched a massive offensive against the undead-occupied lands before the cold winter ended.
Those large super-beastman tribes once supported along the border to fight humans in blood battles had become a sharp blade turned against themselves.
Not only the Tribe Alliance participated, but humans also joined in, with tens of thousands of elite troops and beastman armies together conducting this sweeping retaliatory war across the Kawa Great Forest.
The timing of this counterattack was meticulously chosen.
During the cold winter, these mutated undead were already limited in activity sensitivity.
With the human elite army joining in, the united forces progressed swiftly like a hot knife through butter.
Vast areas were raided, countless undead were purged.
The lands controlled by undead were entirely fallen, and those pyramid structures were destroyed, leaving nothing behind.
Everything proceeded smoothly, though some wise individuals sensed something amiss.
Yet, more were optimistic about the future of warfare, and any dissent was submerged in the crowd.
Meanwhile, the legendary figures behind everything remained eerily silent.
Cannon fodder is ultimately meant to be consumed.
If the Beastman Royal Court had no backup plan, the legacy of the Beastman Empire from years past would have been fully depleted, and everything would be joyous.
However, if those pure-blooded beastmen possessed a secret weapon, consuming one wave to probe reality wouldn’t be bad.
The numerous Tribe Alliance beastmen were the best reconnaissance tool.
Thus,
The triumphantly advancing united army charged straight into the core region occupied by the Beastman Royal Court, intending to eliminate the remnants of the Beastman Empire entirely.
Their momentum was unstoppable.
The vast multitude, over a million beastman armies, hadn’t realized they were merely reconnaissance cannon fodder.
So, they surged mightily towards the core area.
Then, they encountered an annihilating attack.
That day,
Upon passing a massive gorge, before reaching the core area of the Kawa Great Forest, three to four hundred miles away from the Beastman Royal Court.
An explosion suddenly occurred.
Like a sun rising slowly from the horizon, the intense heat instantly evaporated tens of thousands of central beastmen, even soil and rock turned to glass instantly, vast soil transformed into dark red lava under the sweep of the fiery shockwave.
Massive clouds of smoke ascended, rising above the intense heat of the Fireball, like a gigantic mushroom cloud slowly ascending across the land!
That unknown explosion took away tens of thousands of beastman lives in an instant.
More beastmen were seriously injured under the subsequent shockwave sweep,
With the Beastman Alliance army’s fortunes reversed, over a million suffered casualties, leading to their defeat.
From beginning to end, the Beastman Royal Court didn’t even reveal itself.
Simultaneously, afar on the battlefield.
A perceivable tide rippled in the void, several magnificent figures gathered together.
The powerful aura of these figures merged into the void, seemingly casting aside the entire heaven and earth.
They were figures of great stature.
Moreover, among great figures, their words could decide the fall of a duchy, the lives and deaths of hundreds of thousands of beings.
They stood at the undisputed peak of the Prime Material Plane while Divine beings were hidden, and Epic figures were in retreat.
Yet, at this moment,
These great figures gazed at the mushroom cloud slowly ascending in the distance, remaining silent, unable to utter a word.
This was the battlefield over a thousand kilometers apart.
Even over such a remote distance, the destructive power could still be felt.
"How do you see this?"
A deep voice reverberated through the void, lightly rippling the air.
"As expected of the pure-blooded beastmen who founded the Beastman Empire back then. Even though they’ve fallen, they still possess means to survive or achieve mutual destruction."
Another slightly sharp and sinister voice sounded.
A brief silence followed.
For as legendary figures, they too felt the destructive force emanating from the battlefield where the mushroom cloud arose,
A terrifying power even they couldn’t withstand!
A force capable of slaying anyone among them.
The probe was indeed correct.
Over a million beastman alliance forces ultimately uncovered something.
"Likely, the pure-blooded beastmen may have nothing more, but if they do, it won’t be much. Next, we need to continue organizing counterattacks."
"But the alliance has already collapsed, over half a million beastmen casualties, they won’t continue anymore."
"The human coalition hasn’t been defeated, presumably they pre-received intelligence to evade this catastrophe, afterward, rally all external forces surrounding the Kawa Great Forest, attack together. Once isn’t enough, then twice, thrice, until all of their depths are exhausted!"
Someone’s cold voice uttered, devoid of any emotion.
His intention was to organize all sentient forces in the Kawa Great Forest, whether large or small tribes, or Lords of Magical Beasts with minions, into a grand army to continue using lives to deplete the Beastman Royal Court’s destructive weaponry.
"What if someone doesn’t follow orders?"
"Do they dare?"
Indeed they daren’t,
The order united by several legendary figures.
Unless a power was inherently within the Legendary Realm, or had legend-level backing.
Otherwise, destined to be reconnaissance cannon fodder.
The negotiation was decided.
Following the collapse of the tribe alliance, and gathering remaining forces, individual strong emissaries, bearing legends’ orders, started heading out in all directions.

chapters.title: Chapter 313 - 309 Urgency (1st update, seeking subscription)
chapters.content:
Chapter 313: Chapter 309 Urgency (1st update, seeking subscription)
On the mountain peak, Austin was concentrating all his heart and soul on the formation of the Four Spirits Sword Array.
Vaguely, there was a slight rumbling sound from afar, even the Celestial Secret Aura seemed to ripple, and the sky’s light somewhere appeared slightly brighter.
This vibration was not large, the rumbling sound was somewhat subdued, and the brightness of half the sky was even faint; without careful perception, one would hardly notice anything unusual.
The creatures near the Dragon Nest Tribe did not feel anything at all, going about their business as usual.
However,
Entering a Void Meditation State, Austin, who was comprehending the Law Divine Sword, was extraordinarily sensitive to changes in the aura of heaven and earth.
The original aura of the four Law Divine Swords was converging in the void, and the external fluctuations acted as an amplifier within the aura field formed by the four Law Divine Swords.
This naturally made Austin aware of this phenomenon, waking him from his deep concentration.
"Huh? Is that the direction of the core region?"
Looking towards the core region of the Kawa Great Forest, Austin’s face was full of seriousness.
Despite being separated by such a great distance, he could still sense the shockwave produced by the explosion.
The destructive aura that rushed towards the heavens stirred the Celestial Secret Aura into chaos.
Though it had weakened to an almost negligible level by the time it spread here, it raised tumultuous waves in Austin’s heart.
"Could the great war have begun? Such a level of attack..."
Although the Dragon Nest Tribe was in a secluded corner, it wasn’t completely ignorant.
Years ago, after a conflict between the Dragon Nest Tribe and Blood Claw Tribe, Austin trained some talents in intelligence to make up for this deficiency.
Information about the gathering of tribal alliance armies, the subsequent involvement of human armies.
Even the specific date of the coalition’s counterattack, the Dragon Nest Tribe learned from those secret spy informants.
Austin was mostly clear about the coalition’s movements.
If there were no surprises, with the coalition’s previous momentum, they were close to breaking through the undead and undead’s defenses to formally engage the Beastman Royal Court.
It seemed that the Beastman Royal Court had deployed some powerful weapon.
Considering the explosion’s impact, the coalition must have suffered significant damage.
"Such degree of power, even a Legendary figure could hardly withstand it. No wonder up to now no Legendary figures have personally intervened for a decapitation strategy, instead expending extensive manpower and resources for a gradual attrition against the core region’s Beastman Royal Court."
With a turn of thought, Austin understood some of the cause and effect.
Back then, the mysterious bald Guppa had advised Austin not to easily get involved in this war.
Now it seemed that it was the right decision.
The power involved was far beyond what Austin, who was just Gold Middle Tier at the time, could face. In such a war, he would be nothing more than a slightly larger grasshopper, doomed to vanish without a trace upon the slightest mistake.
"Even if the coalition suffers heavy losses, those high-ranking Legendary figures would never give up, potentially leading to new changes in the future."
Austin pondered, looking towards the core region of the Forest Land, with a heavy heart.
At that time, perhaps he and the Clan Tribe under his command might be forcibly drawn into this war.
"The Four Spirits Sword Array needs to accelerate, I need stronger power!"
At this moment, Austin felt a sudden urgency.
Only with stronger strength could one hope to have more influence in certain matters.
Understanding this, Austin resumed his contemplation.
Fortunately, since the explosion, there had been no movement from the core region, allowing him to calmly perceive and ponder.
Perhaps it was the pressure from afar or the shockwave from the explosion that sparked Austin’s insight.
He quickly thought of a problem.
The Four Spirits Sword Array, rooted in the concept of the Cyan Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Black Tortoise, had an indispensable connection to these four Holy Beasts.
Thus, when building the framework, should this point be emphasized?
"Without essence, perhaps this is the state of the four Law Divine Swords. Without the true Four Symbols, how can one forcibly claim it is the Four Spirits Sword Array?"
A gentle epiphany arose in Austin’s mind.
Essence, he needed to imbue the four Law Divine Swords with true essence!
But how exactly should this be done?
Austin thought for a long while, his past life’s knowledge flashing through his mind.
Finally, he came up with an idea.
Contemplation Method.
In some fantasy and immortal hero novels of the past life, there was something called the Contemplation Method.
No matter the novel, this Contemplation Method was related to Spiritual Power and some mysterious "Divine Will."
If one could visualize the forms of the Cyan Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Black Tortoise in the mind, obtaining a trace of their Divine Will, and integrating it into the four Law Divine Swords.
In doing so, could the Undead Sword Array naturally form, completing itself?
The possibility is great!
At least, the principle is quite convincing.
Upon the thought, Austin began the attempt.
Luckily, he could roughly visualize the form of the Four Symbols Holy Beasts based on past descriptions.
Thus, he started the visualization of the four Holy Beasts in his mind.
Time passed, day by day.
Cold winter quietly ended, spring returned to the earth, and the snow-covered world finally regained its vitality.
The Dragon Nest Beastmen began a new round of cultivation, while also gathering sufficient resources from the outside forest.
The military continued its training to enhance its strength.
A half-month later, Austin opened his eyes again, filled with undisguised excitement and joy.
He succeeded.
The forms of the Four Symbols Holy Beasts have been visualized, condensing into a mark deep within Austin’s mind.
In the past life, no matter how much he visualized, nothing discernible came about.
However, in this world where extraordinary power manifests, through Spiritual Power visualization, the kind of visualization technique that seemed fictional exhibited its effect.
The Cyan Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Black Tortoise have crossed dimension for rebirth.
The Four Holy Beasts have shaped and gained a trace of Divine Will through Austin’s visualization and comprehension.
With the appearance of these beasts possessing a trace of Divine Will, Austin noticed an inexplicable subtle relationship among their shadows.
Without hesitation, Austin then began to forge the Divine Will of the four Holy Beasts into the four Law Divine Swords.

chapters.title: Chapter 314 - 310: Completion (Second Update Asking for Subscription)
chapters.content:
Chapter 314: Chapter 310: Completion (Second Update Asking for Subscription)
At the mountain peak, Austin was immersed in his heart spirit, engaged in tense development.
The Divine Will of the Four Divine Beasts’ shadows had been fully visualized, and the next step was to merge them into the four Law Divine Swords, fusing the Law Divine Swords and the shadows of the Divine Beasts together.
Cyan Dragon governs thunder, White Tiger governs wind, Vermilion Bird governs fire, and Black Tortoise governs water.
At the same time, the Four Divine Beasts must also align with the four cardinal directions of east, west, south, and north.
As the Divine Will of the Four Divine Beasts’ shadows infused into the Law Divine Swords of their respective attributes and entered the four positions within the void,
A strange transformation was born leisurely within the mysterious connection.
The auras interwove and merged in between, with streaks of energy blending in the void, that pervasive vacuous aura of heaven and earth constantly rising, and the Elemental Power became restless, causing the entire void to undulate like tides.
Finally, at a certain moment, the four Law Divine Swords transformed!
Rumble!!!
A loud bang, as if the Four Spirits Sword Array crossed boundaries to be reborn, the terrifying aura that surged through the heavens and earth flooded the sky, the sharp aura seemingly slicing through space, as if carving a territory within a radius of several miles, separating it independently.
This was a true separation, extracting a region from the vast universe, forming a sword array world of its own!
Within this sword array world, the waves surged as tides rose and fell like ocean waves, storms and lightning filled the four directions, while flames and water coiled up.
In the trembling space, four streams of aura rose from the ground and penetrated the sky, like four gigantic pillars supporting the entire space.
Streams of energy circulated, filling every corner of the void, filled with boundless murderous intent and a pervasive ferocity.
It succeeded!
No matter which enemy, upon being trapped within the sword array, they would face endless entanglement of energy strands.
Unless they broke the four Law Divine Swords located in the southeast, northwest directions, there was no escape.
But, the four Law Divine Swords were united, dealing with one would be like dealing with four swords at the same time.
After the infusion of the Four Divine Beasts’ shadows, they seemed to possess a consciousness of their own.
The close connection between them made it so that facing any one Law Divine Sword felt like confronting the power of all four!
This was not something that could be done just by placing four Law Divine Swords together, but rather it formed a transformation that even Austin could not comprehend.
This was a true Four Spirits Sword Array, possessing the genuine power of the Four Spirits Sword Array!
"After spending so much time, it has finally succeeded!"
At the mountain peak, Austin’s pupils revealed an irrepressible joy.
The power of the Four Spirits Sword Array left him quite satisfied.
The barely exposed, awe-inspiring aura alone was enough for Austin to sense its terrifying power within.
Tearing through the vacuum, re-enacting earth, fire, wind, and water.
Even if a Legendary Realm were to fall in, it might not fare well at all!
Austin made a rough estimate of the Four Spirits Sword Array in his heart, and his heart also settled down.
Even in the face of a legend, with the strength he had now gained, he might not be powerless to resist.
The Four Spirits Sword Array could serve as his newest trump card.
With a thought, the Law Divine Swords suspended in the east, west, south, and north directions turned into streaks of light, penetrating the layers of void, and returned to Austin’s body, with the anomalies in the surrounding void dispersing and calming down as well.
The four Law Divine Swords were nurtured within Austin’s body to enhance their power.
Through the nurturing method of Sword Nurturing Technique, the power of the Four Spirits Sword Array at the moment of drawing would only be even stronger!
"This time, the closed-door training yielded a lot."
First, he became thoroughly familiar with controlling his power that had surged to the Half-Legendary Level, then his precision in controlling his own Magic Power also reached an extremely fine level.
Then, through comprehending the four Law Divine Swords, he unexpectedly broke through the bottleneck of the Multi-attribute Rasengan and reached a higher level.
Lastly, the completion of the Four Spirits Sword Array gave him a fighting chance even in the face of legends.
This time the closed-door training was quite fruitful.
His strength improved significantly!
Throughout the Kawa Great Forest, he now had enough power to protect himself.
Even if the war were intense, he had enough confidence to remain uninvolved.
Nor did he need to worry about someday falling into a disaster and becoming a corpse in the wilderness, turned to dust beneath the earth.
Thinking this far, having obtained enough power to protect himself, Austin also breathed a sigh of relief.
The heavy stone pressing on his mind felt as if it had been lifted away.
From now on, the sky’s the limit allowing him to soar freely.
Of course, it’s still safer to travel the world after ascending to the Legendary Realm.
This retreat was highly rewarding, but it also consumed a lot of his time.
For more than half a year, Austin spent most of his time in a state of secluded cultivation.
Moreover, as his level grew, each retreat became increasingly lengthy.
However, this "lengthy" duration was insignificant compared to the thousands of years of lifespan of the Dragon Race.
"Secluded for so long, it’s time to go back."
Austin stretched his wings, moved his muscles and bones, feeling an unprecedented comfort.
This is the confidence that comes with power.
Now, he already had the confidence to stand firm within the Kawa Great Forest.
"In a few years, when I ascend to Legendary, the war in the Great Forest will probably be over, hmm, this time the Beastman Tribe Alliance must have suffered significant losses, just in time, when those legends leave, the Kawa Great Forest will be my, Austin’s, era!"
Back then, with only a few subordinate beastmen under his command, he wanted to establish a Beastman Empire.
Now, after only a few years, he had already glimpsed a ray of hope.
All that remained was to wait until the end of the war.
But, can he really ascend to Legendary in a few years?
Actually, Austin himself was not very sure.
There is a great difference between the Legendary and peak Gold Levels.
While dragons reach Legendary upon maturity due to the advantage of their bloodline, relying on the awakening of the Law Origin within the Giant Dragon Bloodline to automatically enter the Legendary Realm,
although Austin was a giant dragon, achieving legendary status before maturity was no easier than for other creatures.
Achieving Legendary as a juvenile offered no particular advantage.
Without some great opportunity, it is difficult.
However, if he could ascend to Legendary through his efforts, he might gain more benefits.
"Forget it, I still have at least a hundred years before I reach maturity, I’ll consider future matters then."
The young dragons of his age must still be struggling at the Silver Level.
Thinking of this, Austin’s mood improved significantly.
Casting aside various thoughts, Austin flapped his wings, stirring the wind attribute elements in the surrounding void, causing a fierce storm to rise around him.
His massive form, under a powerful lift, soared upward, heading towards the direction of the Dragon Nest Tribe.

chapters.title: Chapter 315 - 311: Shadow Stripe Tiger People (Third Update, Seeking Monthly Pass)
chapters.content:
Chapter 315: Chapter 311: Shadow Stripe Tiger People (Third Update, Seeking Monthly Pass)
A hundred miles away from the Dragon Nest Tribe, amidst a certain mountain range.
A group of powerful beastmen walked through the mountains, murderous aura permeating and soaring into the sky.
"Master Vira, up ahead is the tribe of that Blue Young Dragon. It’s said that the former greatest warrior of the Blood Claw Tribe also met their end at its hands. Are we really going to barge right in?"
As they walked, a beastman with a sharp face cautiously asked the leader, a dark-striped tiger beastman who exuded a domineering presence like a giant iron tower.
They were the emissaries dispatched by the Legendaries.
At the forefront was the dark-striped tiger beastman, Vira, a powerful half-legendary warrior.
However, in front of the Legendaries, they could only obediently play the role of messengers, tasked with uniting and rallying the forces from all directions to form a coalition army against the Beastman Royal Court.
Along this journey, they traveled thousands of kilometers, visiting any tribe with a bit of strength.
Even small and medium-sized tribes scattered across the Forest Land with only a few hundred people were not left out. Of course, they wouldn’t waste time personally visiting each one to showcase their strength one by one.
To this end, not a single beastman tribe refused.
Because, the leaders of any tribe that refused had all perished.
Along the way, the beastmen crushed by the powerful strength of the dark-striped tiger beastman Vira numbered no less than a thousand, including several Silver-level tribal leaders, and even some Gold-level beastmen met their demise at his hands.
Disagree?
Kill those who disagree, and the rest will naturally comply.
One by one, the beastman tribes were subdued and integrated, even some intelligent alien creatures were incorporated into the coalition.
This was the will of the Legendaries: the strong reign supreme, defy and perish!
"Hahaha, a mere Gold-level creature dares to call itself the greatest warrior? Do you think I’m of the same ilk as that thing?"
The dark-striped tiger beastman laughed heartily, his voice shaking the void, causing the sharp-faced beastman to bleed from his nose and mouth.
"Yes, yes, my lord’s divine might is naturally invincible. A measly Blue Dragon is just something that’ll kneel at your feet and kiss the dirt by your toes."
Fear surged in his heart as he fawned repeatedly.
"Hmm, you’re good. Don’t worry. Are you sure that Young Dragon has no backing?"
"Master Vira, this is certain. The nearby beastmen all know that dragon appeared alone a few years ago. Initially, he hunted and foraged on his own. Even after establishing a Clan Tribe, no adult Giant Dragons have been seen visiting. It’s definitely an orphaned dragon or an exiled Young Dragon."
The sharp-faced beastman chattered away, revealing almost all of Austin’s background.
"Just a Young Dragon, then. Although it has some capabilities, it’s nothing more than that."
Vira grinned, revealing fearsome fangs, then looked over at the sharp-faced beastman who had stopped beside him.
"Very good, mud spawn, you’ve pleased me. What reward do you want?"
Under Vira’s gaze, the beastman suddenly felt a mountain-like pressure descend on his shoulders, feeling both fear and excitement.
"Master Vira, I..."
However, he hadn’t finished speaking.
Splut!
Suddenly, his head exploded, spraying red and white all over the ground.
The headless beastman stood there as hot blood gushed from his neck, splattering onto the ground.
Vira didn’t spare him a glance, continuing forward, and the team behind followed suit, ignoring the corpse as they walked past.
"On second thought, rewards are too much trouble, so let’s just kill him. Everyone, push on a bit more. Before it gets dark, your lord wants to rest in that Dragon Nest Tribe!"
The team moved far away, leaving only a headless body behind.
Soon, the wild beasts that had been intimidated by the group’s presence began to gather around, devouring the corpse.
Beastmen have hierarchies as well.
In front of a powerful being, that sharp-faced beastman was just a backcountry native, ranking even below a slave.
A group of mountain monkeys, actually expecting a reward?
Having the opportunity to serve a noble was already their greatest fortune.
Unfortunately, that beastman hadn’t realized this.
So, he died, left by the roadside, becoming food for wild beasts.
...
Within the Dragon Nest Tribe, the entire tribe efficiently operated, steadily developing.
"His Highness has been in seclusion for over a winter now. Who knows when he will emerge."
The term ’seclusion’ was brought by Austin.
To the beastmen, power was gained through battle, more battle, and breakthroughs in battle.
Austin’s method of gaining strength through seclusion was something they’d never heard of—it could only be said that a dragon does extraordinary things.
As Austin’s admirers, the beastmen of the Dragon Nest Tribe weren’t surprised.
"Indeed, without His Highness, it’s hard to make decisions, especially with the current state of war. The Dragon Nest Tribe might be facing a great danger."
At this moment, inside the City Hall, looking out the window at the rising clusters of buildings below.
The administrator, Vini, was having a daily conversation with Quik.
"His Highness mentioned that this war is likely being orchestrated from behind by Legendaries on the Beastman Tribe Alliance side. Now that the Tribe Alliance has suffered a major defeat with significant losses, if the Legendaries refuse to give up, they’ll have to seek reinforcements elsewhere."
"Does that mean the Dragon Nest Tribe is destined to be drawn into this war? Back then, the Tribe Alliance did send emissaries to us, but His Highness refused them. This time, it seems difficult to avoid being drawn in."
"It seems avoiding war is indeed unlikely."
The atmosphere suddenly turned heavy.
The Dragon Nest Tribe was not afraid of war, but they had no desire to be dragged into a war with no benefit.
After Austin destroyed the Pyramid, the Beastman Royal Court in the core region had stopped sending the Undead Army against the Dragon Nest Tribe, so there hadn’t been much conflict.
Moreover, the coalition beastman army numbering millions from the Tribe Alliance hadn’t even reached the core region before suffering devastating attacks.
Though the Dragon Nest Legion was strong, in a war of this magnitude, they would likely suffer heavy losses.
However, no matter how unwilling, in the end, they had to join.
After all, that was the will of the Legendaries.
"Since it’s unavoidable, let Rodney train the army and prepare for battle. We must showcase our strength and not rely entirely on His Highness. Besides, from the Beastman Royal Court, perhaps those weapons are few in number."
"As long as those weapons don’t appear on the battlefield, our tribe’s legion can sweep through those so-called pure-bloods!"
Vini let out a long sigh, making a decision.
However, unexpectedly, Quik’s heavy expression remained unchanged.
"Vini, the Beastman Royal Court isn’t that simple."
"Oh?"
Vini looked at Quik, eyes filled with inquiry.
After a moment’s hesitation, Quik finally spoke up, though his voice was strained:
"Vini, actually, I come from the core region and have witnessed certain things. Pure-blooded beastmen are far more terrifying than you imagine...."
Quik’s words, though not loud, stirred waves of shock in the heart of Vini the Kobold.
"What?!!!"
Yet before he could inquire further.
Boom!!!
A thunderous roar suddenly erupted in the heavens, followed by a tsunami-like torrent accompanied by flying debris, covering the entire Dragon Nest Tribe.
In an instant, more than half of the buildings in the Dragon Nest Tribe collapsed.
"Young ones, get out here and welcome your Lord Vira!"

chapters.title: Chapter 316 - 312 Impact
chapters.content:
Chapter 316: Chapter 312 Impact
The walls of the Dragon Nest Tribe City exploded with a thunderous roar, a torrent mixed with massive clouds of dust surged like a sandstorm sweeping the sky, engulfing the entire Dragon Nest Tribe like a tsunami caused by a natural disaster.
The gale swept through streets and alleys, causing houses to collapse one after another. A terrifying aura permeated the void, descending from the sky.
Within the whole Dragon Nest Tribe, all Dragon Nest Beastmen felt as if a mountain was weighing heavily on their shoulders.
"Enemy attack!!!"
"Someone’s attacking, everyone assemble!"
Accompanied by roars, Dragon Nest Beastmen soldiers swiftly emerged from all directions, forming neat military formations to surround the giant gap filled with swirling dust.
The rolling dust rose high, the tall walls blasted open a huge breach, shattered bricks and wood scattered across the ground.
"Who are you!"
Gazing at the powerful figures emerging from the breach, the leading Beastman Officer among the Dragon Nest Beastman army shouted loudly.
"Tsk tsk, so this is the tribe established by that dragon? Not bad, the army indeed appears somewhat elite, perfect as top-grade cannon fodder."
As the smoke and dust gradually dissipated, figures stepped forth.
At the forefront, dark-patterned tiger-man Vira held a Dragon Nest Beastmen soldier’s head, casually snapped it, and dropped it like a useless snake, smashing it into pulp.
His gaze swept casually around,
instantly, Dragon Nest Beastmen soldiers around felt an overwhelming pressure surging like a tidal wave.
The space where the dark-patterned tiger-man stood, radiated such strong power it seemed to dim the very light!
"Summon your foolish dragon here, your Lord Vira has orders."
With a commanding presence, the dark-patterned tiger-man’s deep voice filled with arrogance.
This is his style in handling everything.
Along the way, achieving victories over stronger tribes directly, subduing their leaders, then issuing orders to unite the armies with an overwhelming announcement.
Those daring to resist were dealt with simply by being killed, leaving those alive inclined to organize the troops.
This approach proved highly effective, especially in this wilderness where might rules and only the strong survive.
Moreover, to quickly gather a sufficient amount of cannon fodder, this was the only method.
With his Half-Legendary level, this overbearing approach encountered no resistance.
Now, dark-patterned tiger-man Vira applied this crude and simple style to the Dragon Nest Tribe.
Killing a batch of people, then facing the Blue Young Dragon to relay the orders.
If disobedient, crush with force or neutralize.
"Courting death! You’re provoking His Highness!"
Vira’s words immediately incited boundless fury among the Dragon Nest Beastmen soldiers.
In every Beastman’s heart in the Dragon Nest Tribe, Austin, who created the entire Dragon Nest Tribe, is almost like a deity to them, how could they let him be easily insulted?
At that moment, the leading Beastman Officer in the Dragon Nest army instantly took action.
Stepping on the ground, his figure shot up, agile like a streak of black lightning, appearing above dark-patterned tiger-man Vira.
"You scum insulting His Highness, die!"
A punch crashed from the sky, as if carrying a colossal force, like a small mountain smashing down from above.
"Hmm? Such an interesting way of exerting force, but, a mere Silver Level ant, who gave you the courage to challenge me?"
The dark-patterned tiger-man Vira showed a ferocious expression, a huge hand burst through the air, surprisingly overtaking, like lightning piercing through the Beastman Officer’s defense, grabbing his head.
As if gripping the surrounding air, the void sank, the immense power lifted Beastman Officer’s head, slamming it down heavily.
Boom!!!
With a massive roar, blood burst forth with rock and soil, the ground collapsed, cracks like a spider web spread across.
In an instant, the Beastman Officer’s head was crushed, the body embedded upside down in the mud pit.
But that’s not all!
"Scram!"
Watching Dragon Nest Beastmen soldiers charging ahead, Vira roared, like thunder echoing.
As if a storm surged from flatland, visible shockwaves rippled.
The assembling Dragon Nest Beastman Legion was swept away in the torrent, further Beastmen retreated like dominoes from the violent impact.
With just one roar, the first hundred soldiers gathered were defeated like fallen leaves!
"The enemy is too strong! Soldiers withdraw, all officers take action, capture this scum insulting His Highness!"
At this moment, the entire Dragon Nest Tribe mobilized almost completely.
The army quickly prepared, powerful Beastman Generals arriving ahead.
In an instant, multiple Beastman Officers leapt into the air, using the power of kicking the air, shot like cannonballs.
One by one, Fighting Qi Rasengan whistled in the air, crashing towards the dark-patterned tiger-man.
"Another strange combat technique, get lost, you damned muddy mongrels!"
Facing several Beastman Officers’ attack, Vira roared, his Fighting Qi erupted like a volcano.
Half-Legendary power burst forth instantly, like a vast ocean wave surging in the void.
Holding a Fighting Qi Rasengan, the rapidly approaching Beastman Officers were struck by the explosive aura, their bodies suddenly stiffened.
The next moment, a long whip shadow swept past, the airborne Beastman Officers hit like being struck by lightning, flew away with even greater speed.
"A bunch of little rats dare to defy an elephant’s majesty? Since the cowardly dragon won’t come out, today I shall slaughter here!"
Vira’s voice, deep as thunder, resonated between heaven and earth, beneath him the aura surged like waves, reflecting him as if a Demon God from mythology.
A domineering gaze swept across the sky, treating them like dead men, imposing suffocating pressure on each Beastman.
"Die!"
Vira stomped on the ground, the earth within several meters collapsed.
Enormous power erupted at his feet, eyes flashing with bloodthirsty light.
His companions stepped back.
Because, this state of Vira signifies yet another round of slaughter!
As it was before, perhaps so it will be now!
Yet just as Vira prepared to act, to kill these Dragon Nest Beastmen in front of him, suddenly, his hair stood on end!

chapters.title: Chapter 317 - 313: The Power of the Four Spirits
chapters.content:
Chapter 317: Chapter 313: The Power of the Four Spirits
It was as if the coldest winter had fallen into an ice cave, with bone-chilling coldness surging from the soles of the feet, like a bucket of icy cold water poured over the head.
Not good!
In the next moment, Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man, suddenly awakened.
Suddenly, an overwhelming, terrifying pressure abruptly descended from the sky, carrying an aura of annihilation, instantly covering Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man, completely.
"Who gave you the courage to cause trouble on my territory?"
A voice, seemingly from beyond the heavens, resounded, faintly accompanied by waves of thundering anger, with murderous intent almost freezing the surrounding space at this moment.
Buzz!!!
An intensely radiant halo appeared out of nowhere in the void before his eyes, its invisible power distorting the air.
Vira’s hair stood on end, as if facing the scythe of Death, his body instinctively flitting backward in a rapid retreat.
Silently, the light blossomed.
Then, the light sphere abruptly expanded, swallowing up the entire space where Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man, had just been.
The halo suddenly inflated, its diameter spreading to several meters in an instant, its radiance severing the vacuum, as if slicing away the space.
Fortunately, it did not continue to explode, the brilliant light only flared for a few seconds, the light sphere did not diffuse or explode but gradually dissipated, leaving a huge void in its wake, the ground underneath also vanishing into a large pit.
Splash!
As if a massive void had torn open in the ocean, air surged in like tides, stirring the void like seismic waves.
"This is... the Law!"
Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man, who had retreated to the back, looked at the giant rift before him with lingering fear.
If he hadn’t reacted quickly, he would surely have suffered heavy damage this time.
To master the Law so effortlessly and to wield its destructive power without letting it spread but dispersing it easily instead.
Half-Legendary!
In an instant, Vira had a clear understanding of Austin’s strength.
Damn it!
This dragon turned out to be Half-Legendary, and at an extremely powerful level among them, who the hell said he was just Gold Level!
At some point, Austin’s figure had appeared above the Dragon Nest Tribe, the whirlwinds spiraled between heaven and earth, gathering a storm of swirling clouds that shrouded the entire heavens in an abyss of unfathomable darkness.
The vast aura swept across the sky, shaking the surrounding void like a surging sea.
Watching the sky ahead dim, with shadows cast over the sky, the dark-striped Tiger Man nearly cursed aloud.
The intelligence on this dragon was never accurate.
"I didn’t expect Your Excellency to have already reached the threshold of the Legendary, sorry, this time it was my offense."
A myriad of thoughts flickered through Vira’s mind as he nodded slightly at Austin, expressing apology, though the apology lacked sincerity.
Since they were at Half-Legendary, with strength similar to his, refusing to fight was not an option.
But fortunately, he was carrying out orders from those Legendary behind him, so there was no need to be overly humble, just offer a slight concession.
However, Vira overlooked one point.
In the eyes of other Half-Legendaries, subordinates and clans being easily fought and killed didn’t matter.
The existence of a Half-Legendary was nearing the doors of the Legendary, not easily offending another powerful contender of the same rank over a few subordinate lives.
But, Austin was an exception.
The education from a previous life reminded him of a phrase he deeply remembered: "Those who offend my strong Han shall be punished, no matter how distant they are!"
In this Otherworld, he no longer had the blood of that nation, but his thoughts remained aligned.
The Clan Beastmen were his people, the Beastmen belonging to his Clan Tribe!
They were the treasures Austin had painstakingly trained, the seeds for the nation he would build in the future!
When Vira ruthlessly cut down the Dragon Nest Beastmen, with their blood on his hands, it symbolized an unending feud with Austin, with no possibility of conciliation.
"You bastards, you really think I’m a sick cat if I don’t show my power, go to hell!"
In the sky above, Austin’s rage surged to the heavens.
Tremendous pressure descended from the sky, like a mountain crushing down on Vira and the other Beastman envoys.
From the moment the tribe was established, they had been repeatedly attacked, suffering severe damages time and again.
He merely wanted a place to farm and cultivate peacefully, why wouldn’t some people let him live quietly?
Why would they force him to kill!
Did they really take Austin as a clay effigy with no temper?
This time, Vira’s brutal massacre of the Dragon Nest Beastmen completely unleashed the pent-up hostility within Austin.
Boom!!!
A terrifying aura surged to the sky, piercing through the void of heaven and earth.
At some point, four phantom Divine Swords containing a mysterious and profound aura rose from the nether realm, their aura spreading like sunlight over the long river of stars, engulfing the heavens and earth.
Simultaneously, four divine roars resounded from distant ethereal heavens.
The phantoms of the Cyan Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, and Black Tortoise rose from the four Law Divine Swords, their aura converging across the sky and earth, forming a complete cycle of harmonious unity.
The entire space, at that moment, seemed to be cleaved apart, entrapping all of them within!
"Damn Blue Dragon! Are you challenging the authority of the Legendary Lords?"
The dark-striped Tiger Man did not know why Austin suddenly attacked, nor did he understand what the sword shadows sealing the space were.
But the blinding killing intent sweeping from all around made him truly feel Austin’s resolute determination to kill him without delay!
The overwhelming killing intent, like thorns in his back!
Austin did not respond,
By then, he had made up his mind to use this arrogant guy as a sacrificial banner.
With the blood of a Half-Legendary powerhouse, to tell all who dared to attack the Dragon Nest Tribe that there was only one end for provocateurs!
With a gentle hum of Sword Dao, threads of aura severed the void, as if spilled from the Milky Way, pouring down toward Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man.
Dense and innumerable, each strand of Sword Qi carried the aura of Law, like a torrential storm, slicing the space into countless sword scars.
"Damn it, what’s this lunatic up to!"
A look of utter shock appeared on the face of Vira, the dark-striped Tiger Man.
Both in awe at Austin’s sudden frenzy, and shocked by this incredibly strange yet overwhelmingly lethal attack technique!
A type of attack he’d never seen before, extremely peculiar, yet it instilled a profound sense of fear and oppression from deep within.
The four strange longswords hovering in the four cardinal directions formed an indescribable connection in the unseen,
capable of ending his life!

chapters.title: Chapter 318 - 314: Law of Power
chapters.content:
Chapter 318: Chapter 314: Law of Power
A strange way of attacking, not to mention those four peculiar longswords scattered in all directions that brought him countless dangers.
The four mysterious beast shadows that slowly rose from the east, west, south, and north, their aura surging towards the sky, seemed to slice the entire void apart, something that Vira had never witnessed before.
Vaguely, those colossal void shadows actually made him feel a sense of being high above.
How is that possible!
Vira, as a Dark-striped Tiger, possesses the bloodline of a naturally extraordinary Dark-striped Tiger King, superior to numerous extraordinary beings in every aspect.
Those inexplicable strange beast remnant shadows, just one mere shadow could suppress his Dark-striped Tiger King bloodline?
Yet despite Vira’s disbelief, with the four divine beast shadows stationed in the east, west, south, and north, the void’s aura rose like an ocean tide, slicing the void around Vira entirely.
Simultaneously, sharp aura emanated from the four Law Divine Swords, filling every corner within the Four Spirits Sword Array Space.
Swish, swish, swish!
The violent wind roared, instantly like countless sharp blades densely covering the sky, transforming into a fierce storm under Austin’s manipulation of spiritual power, bombarding towards Vira.
In an instant, the sharp aura seemed to shatter the vacuum, elongating into translucent sharp swords during its descent, exuding a terrifying aura.
Sword lights split, thousands of Divine Swords fell from the sky!
Every beam of sword aura contained divine might enough to slay a Silver Level Extraordinary, let alone the qualitative change from the quantitative surge; even a Legendary would suffer immensely under such a concentrated barrage!
At this moment, Vira the Dark-striped Tiger was in the most perilous situation of his life!
"You are courting death!"
Feeling the palpable killing intent accompanied by thousands of descending swords, Vira’s eyes turned red, his Half-Legendary aura unleashed completely.
The fighting Qi around him surged like a Vast Sea, his fur like steel needles stood erect, a booming sound like a river flowed within his shell, muscles bulged, his body expanded, taking on a dark metallic hue.
"Want to kill me? I’d like to see what gives you the confidence!"
His monstrous body, already three to four meters tall, rose even further, the ground beneath him cracked inch by inch, and a fierce wind swept around.
Momentum skyrocketed, as if transformed into a giant, Vira raised his fist to the sky, launching an explosive punch upwards at the incoming sword aura.
Boom!!!
Like wind, like tsunami, like thundering eruption, seemingly, a divine demon from ancient times emerged from the void, delivering a punch through the myriad realms.
It was as if the space shattered, visible shockwaves rippled outward, raising violent winds between heaven and earth.
Boom boom boom!!!
Fist and swords collided; the explosion of sword lights dissipated the giant fist’s power bit by bit, visibly fading the black fist shadow.
Ultimately, after a breath’s worth of collision, countless sword shadows shattered one after another, and the towering fist shadow collapsed into fragments.
"What!"
Watching his full-force punch shatter, Vira’s pupils contracted sharply.
But before he could react, the sky full of sword shadows poured down at supersonic speed instantly.
Boom boom boom!!!
Thousands of sword lights fell, under the continuous sharp aura bombardment, the space and ground broke into pieces, collapsing, raising a cloud of dust, dyeing half the sky yellow.
All around, the beastmen, whether Dragon Nest Beastmen or Tribe Alliance envoys, watched with mouths agape, faces filled with astonishment.
The strength reached such a degree, akin to possessing the power to change heaven and earth!
This is Legendary power!
Even though neither one dragon nor one beastman has entered that realm.
But merely a Half-Legendary duel already holds the might to destroy mountains and devastate rivers!
Austin hovered above the ninth heaven, his gaze deep.
The endless sharp aura transformed into sword lights persisted for a while, seeming to obliterate the area where Vira stood, before finally ceasing.
The dust clouded the view.
Unable to see the situation below.
Silence fell around.
In the dust, there were no sounds, Vira the Dark-striped Tiger seemed to have turned into powder under the previous bombardment of sword shadows.
Suddenly, Austin’s eyes narrowed.
"Law of Power?"
There was an inexplicable meaning in his voice.
"This path of proving life through power..."
Of course, this proving life through power is far from the grand feat of the Pangu god who created the world with human power, still thousands of miles away.
Below, the dust gradually dispersed, revealing Vira the Dark-striped Tiger’s battered figure.
At this moment, on the ground, a pit hundreds of meters in diameter was blasted, above it floated Vira, heavily wounded, glaring at Austin in the sky.
"Brat, you’ve angered me! Next, I’ll let you taste what fear truly is!"
For the first time, pushed to such an extent.
If he hadn’t decisively used the Law of Power, amplifying his might several times over to withstand the thousands of sword lights, he would likely be a corpse by now!
Anger, unparalleled anger erupted in his chest, already drowning his reason!
Before his words were completed,
Boom!!!
Accompanied by Vira the Dark-striped Tiger’s fierce roar, resounding across the heavens and earth, a terrifying aura swept skyward.
In that moment, he was like a mad dragon plunging into the ninth heaven, his body emitting black fighting Qi, the rolling aura transforming into smoke rising to the sky, within a kilometer radius the void became a storm-laced ocean!
While still in mid-air,
he swung a punch across the void, aimed at Austin in the sky.
Boom!!!
This punch, imbued all his life’s beliefs.
The void, seemingly empty, under this punch, surging like a tsunami, producing continuous explosions.
Space in that moment trembled like a mirror, shattered, deep cracks spread through the void, seemingly engulfing all light above and below.
Under the amplification of all Law of Power, this punch shattered the space, condensed into a phenomenal spectacle of destruction!

chapters.title: Chapter 319 - 315: Four Attribute Rasengan
chapters.content:
Chapter 319: Chapter 315: Four Attribute Rasengan
The surge of energy that shot skyward was like a great sun rising from the rivers, its intense waves shattering the void, causing the space before it to crack open with a sharp sound.
This punch was like the rising sun.
It was also like a meteor ascending the heavens, roaring towards Austin.
The void trembled, sending up endless tides of darkness.
In the sky above, the space rippled like ocean waves as Austin’s gaze hardened.
It was a fight to the death!
This was a sign of the complete release of the Law of Power, the body shattering the vacuum, a peerless might akin to facing a towering mountain crashing down.
"Let me see the quality of your Law of Power then."
High above, Austin’s wings unfolded to their fullest extent in the sky, casting a huge shadow that seemed to cloak the heavens, his overwhelming aura oppressing all of earth and sky.
At the same time, Spiritual Power surged forth.
Bzz bzz bzz!
With the use of Spiritual Power, suddenly, eight or nine vortices twisted and swirled within the space that rippled like tides around.
A vast amount of Magic Power began to be infused, in just an instant merging into several Rasengan.
Simultaneously, as the Magic Rasengan coalesced,
Within seconds, the white Magic Rasengan had completed its attribute transformation!
The highly concentrated power gave the surrounding space an obscure sense of distortion.
"Go!"
With a flap of the wings, the Rasengan shot down from the sky.
Trailing long tails of fire, they cut across the sky, crashing into the rising, space-shattering giant fist!
Boom boom boom...
The collision happened in an instant.
Continuous explosions sounded in the sky, accompanied by dazzling flashes of light, in less than a tenth of a second, there had already been dozens or even hundreds of explosive impacts on the top of the firmament, the air battered as if by thousands of assaults, expanded and burst apart.
But even more terrifying was that
the fist, like a meteor fist countering the heavens, shattered one Rasengan after another, piercing them like paper without hindrance, through the defended line composed of Rasengan.
The attribute-transformed Rasengan were torn apart!
Brilliant light burst across the sky, an energy storm swept in waves in the vacuum like a tsunami, turning the sky above into an ocean of light.
This, was the Law of Power,
The pinnacle of power!
Even the thunder, storms, flames, and water flows within the Rasengan were broken open from within, leaving only the most pure explosive energy.
"Overwhelming strength, indeed worthy of the Law of Power!"
In the sky, facing the indomitable power breaking through each attribute Rasengan, reaching the fist right at him, Austin sighed.
Since the development of the Magic Rasengan, this kind of straightforward breaking has
never happened before.
This was sheer strength above the elemental attribute changes of Rasengan!
And now, the giant fist that shredded the Rasengan, was already at hand.
However, as the massive fist approached, carrying a world-ending aura as if to crush him along with everything,
Austin’s gaze remained unflinching.
He did not use more attribute-changing Rasengan, nor did he make any moves.
His gaze was calm, as if resigned to fate.
Yet, just when Vira Shadowstripe’s punch shattered space, its power like mountains and seas was about to smash into Austin’s head,
Buzz!!!
The four suspended Law Divine Swords flashed with light, faintly showing Cyan Dragon and White Tiger passing by, Vermilion Bird and Black Tortoise intertwining.
A vast energy permeated the sky, merging in the void.
Bang!
In an instant, Vira Shadowstripe’s punch seemed to hit an indestructible mirror, suddenly freezing in mid-air.
The fist shadow with its universe-ending aura, meteoric and magnificent, stopped a meter in front of Austin.
Motionless.
You could even see the destructive aura around the fist shadow, stirring the air.
The shattered vacuum fissures around were also frozen in place, as if time had stopped here.
"This is!"
Vira Shadowstripe’s pupils contracted, he felt space from all sides rushing in, pinning him in place.
The space, stagnant.
Even with the Law of Power, he struggled to escape this powerful solidifying force.
"The true function of the Four Spirits Sword Array is still confinement and defense; attack is merely an accompanying effect!"
Above, Austin flapped his wings, his huge form turning into a blue lightning.
In an instant, he traversed space, appearing hundreds of meters above the sword-bound Vira Shadowstripe.
The next moment,
Bzz!!!
Accompanied by endless terrifying energy spreading across the sky, Austin summoned a fearsome light sphere beneath his claws, gathering unknowingly.
One meter in size, brilliantly glowing,
Yet the void around the edges faintly showed dark shadows, as if the space it touched was crushed.
Wind, thunder, water, fire.
These were four attribute-changing Rasengan!
These four elements gathered in the Rasengan, exponentially increasing in power, harboring world-destroying force!
Austin wielded this four-attribute changing Rasengan with his claws,
Descended from the sky!
The space it passed left a gentle trace!
At the same time,
Below, Vira Shadowstripe’s pupils shrank, his scalp tingled, feeling a disaster of destruction descending from above.
Complete dread, complete catastrophe engulfed him completely!
"Ah!!! Get out of my way!"
Vira roared skyward, his Fighting Qi and Law of Power fully unleashed.
Vast power shook the void like tidal waves, the space mirrored with violent tremors.
Crack crack...
Ultimately only Half-Legendary, on par with Austin.
In a desperate struggle, ignoring backlash, the space emitted continuous snapping sounds as cracks spread.
In moments, everything shattered with a crash.
Imprisoning strength was completely broken!
However, Vira Shadowstripe hadn’t had time to rejoice when the splendid Rasengan emitting dark light from above suddenly smashed down.
Bzz bzz bzz!!!
Vira barely had time to look up, seeing the compressed space crush down with immeasurable force.
His massive body along with the space was squeezed like a rag by the horrible light sphere, pressed down, his flesh seemingly squeezed into a flat plane.
Explosion!!!
The four-attribute changing Rasengan suddenly expanded, swallowing all surrounding brilliance, rapidly expanding outward.
Just its aura sent the Celestial Secret Aura within several miles raging like tides, sweeping across the heavens and earth, the world shook incessantly as if to return to chaos, reenacting wind, thunder, water, fire!
Seeing the four-attribute changing Rasengan about to expand to its limit, nearing the final explosion,
Austin’s face grew extremely solemn, his Spiritual Power operating Four Symbols Heaven and Earth.
Shush!!!
The sword light of the skies and earth unleashed like a galaxy waterfall swept across.
Accompanied by the faint cry of Divine Beasts from ancient times, the vital essence of Cyan Dragon, White Tiger, Vermilion Bird, Black Tortoise intermingled in the ethereal heavens, ultimately solidifying and suppressing the Sword Array Space.
The rapidly expanding four-attribute Rasengan’s power dissipated under this suppression.

chapters.title: Chapter 320 - 316 Special
chapters.content:
Chapter 320: Chapter 316 Special
The spiral sphere formed by the fusion of four attribute powers generates a force nearly sixteen times greater than that of a single attribute spiral sphere.
This force is not merely a simple addition; it is a true, multiplied destructive amplification.
Once the destructive force contained within it erupts, even the Four Symbols Sword Array will suffer significant damage.
If the aftermath of the explosion were to breach the sword array, it might cause a devastating impact on the entire Dragon Nest Tribe.
Fortunately, the newly created sword array is strong enough; amidst the powerful convergence of energies, it ultimately suppresses the explosive force within, dissipating it into the void.
However, while the final expansive force was suppressed and dissipated by the Four Spirits Sword Array, the terrifying destructive force nonetheless exerted a mighty impact on the sword array. The energy cracks that had already appeared during the struggle against the dark-marked tiger man Vira now manifested as dense fractures, as if about to collapse.
The Four Spirits Sword Array, on its first appearance, was already severely damaged and on the verge of collapse.
After all, it was newly created, with imperfections still present.
However, compared to its achievements, it deserved to be truly considered glorious.
A Half-Legendary existence was easily slain by Austin within the bindings of the Four Spirits Sword Array.
If it weren’t for this Four Spirits Sword Array, never mind whether Vira could be slain; in a life-and-death battle, Austin might have suffered severe injury on the spot.
Though the multi-attribute spiral sphere is powerful, it takes time to condense, and if it misses the enemy, it serves no purpose.
"The Four Spirits Sword Array is indeed impressive in power, but now it can only be considered in a preliminary state; hence it won’t shatter so easily. It still needs further enhancement."
Looking at the densely fractured surroundings in the space of the Four Spirits Sword Array about to shatter after a huge battle, Austin sighed slightly in his heart. With a motion of his spiritual power, the four Law Divine Swords stationed at the four corners transformed into streams of light and returned within his body following his thoughts.
Indeed, it was unfortunate for the sword array; in its debut battle, it encountered Vira, who had comprehended the Law of Power. Otherwise, it wouldn’t have reached the brink of collapse.
"Completely dead."
Below, the earth surged with dust to the sky, and the aura of the dark-marked tiger man Vira had completely dissipated.
Moreover, Austin had already sensed the aura of the Law Origin in the void.
Without any hesitation, Austin flew down from the sky, descending into the dust.
In the pit where Vira’s figure was now absent, there was only a mass of the Power Law Origin.
Without much hesitation,
Austin directly swallowed the Power Law Origin on the verge of merging into the void in one gulp.
Perhaps because it doesn’t contain powerful elemental forces like other Elemental Law Origins, or maybe because Austin’s level increased to Half-Legendary, and his body, hardened by the tempering of lava, was as robust as steel.
In any case, after swallowing the Power Law Origin, Austin merely felt a slight fullness in his stomach without suffering much impact.
This was good; there was no need to endure the previous kind of ordeal.
Once the Power Law Origin is devoured and refined, his combat strength will surely rise to another level.
Having mastered five laws at Half-Legendary, never mind other Half-Legendaries; even some newly ascended Legendaries, may not have sensed that many laws.
The perception of laws becomes increasingly difficult as one progresses.
Especially after reaching Legendary, due to the influence of one’s own Law Origin Path, it’s hard to perceive other laws.
It can be said that Austin now, compared to some weaker Legendaries, is already walking a path that advances further.
Of course, this progress is not unrelated to his innate ability to devour laws.
And Austin herself would not know at this moment what this capability represents.
In the future, he will discover.
Even among all the top bloodline Dragon Race, the success rate of devouring a third law is pitifully low, and due to various reasons, may even cause more harm than good.
Only he is special...
In the huge pit, aside from the devoured Power Law Origin, nothing else was left.
It seems the dark-marked tiger man Vira is thoroughly obliterated.
Having swallowed the Power Law Origin, Austin did not linger, spreading his wings and flying out.
With Austin’s appearance, the whole Dragon Nest Tribe was enveloped in a fervent atmosphere.
The remarkable might created the glory of the Dragon Nest Tribe.
All this made Austin an object of fanatical worship in the hearts of all Dragon Nest Beastmen.
Compared to the fervent cheers of the Dragon Nest Beastmen, the Alliance envoys were as silent as cicadas in cold.
Even Half-Legendary Ambassador Vira was dead; what could they possibly do?
Austin descended before them, and under that great shadow, the pressure was even more overwhelming.
"Great His Highness Blue Dragon, we only come in accordance with the will of your excellencies, if any offense was caused during this process, please forgive us."
Compared to their previous haughty demeanor, now these Beastmen’s expressions were as humble as could be.
However, Austin still keenly noticed something peculiar about the speaking Beastman envoy. From his words and actions, perhaps his status wasn’t simple, at least he was intelligent...
Austin was also temporarily unwilling to break ties with those few Legendaries,
Looking down at the crowd, a deep voice sounded:
"That fool killed my Clan, insulted me to my face, so I killed him; I ask the Alliance ambassadors to understand."
The one causing trouble in the Dragon Nest Tribe was the dark-marked tiger man Vira. Although other Beastmen envoys held haughty postures, they did not take action.
Austin did not intend to eliminate all of them.
After all, even though Austin was now Half-Legendary, he still needed to show a certain reverence for those high-ranking Legendary Level existences.
Those hidden Legendaries’ words made Vira find no peace.
Thus, the tense atmosphere finally eased.
Austin ordered Vini to host, leading the envoys into the grand hall for discussion.
In comparison to the dark-marked tiger man Vira, who had enough strength to act arrogantly, the remaining frightened deputy envoys were evidently more tactful.
Afterwards, in the grand hall, when Austin moved spiritually and displayed the crystal scale left by a bald-headed middle-aged man from over half a year ago.
A Beastman among the Alliance envoys immediately exclaimed:
Celestial Dragon Island!
Afterward, the Alliance Beastman envoys never uttered requests for Austin to send troops for counterattacks; instead, they kept bowing and apologizing.
Evidently, among these Alliance envoys, Ambassador Vira was tasked with using his fists to subdue most unyielding factions, forcing them to unite and send troops. The deputy envoys possessed certain insights to avoid offending their own.
It’s unfortunate that the circumstances were unpredictable, and Vira ultimately died at Austin’s hands.

chapters.title: Chapter 321 - 317 Post-War Reconstruction
chapters.content:
Chapter 321: Chapter 317 Post-War Reconstruction
It seems that the Celestial Dragon Island mentioned by Guppa and Avril initially appears to be a formidable force. Even after Austin killed their Half-Legendary envoy, they dared not retaliate in the slightest but instead sought to mend relations with all efforts.
Apparently, the tiger skin Austin currently wields is far larger than he had imagined.
Moreover, after Austin presented that Crystal Dragon Scale, the attitude of these Alliance envoys changed dramatically, leading Austin to ponder further.
Originally, according to Avril, they were invited to reroute through here.
And it seems that the bald middle-aged man named Guppa was summoned to discuss this matter.
