Simultaneously, a vast aura surged from deep within the forbidden area of Demon God Mountain, sweeping across certain corners of the world like a Giant Beast awakening from the wilds.
"We welcome the Holy Lord out of seclusion!"
All the high-ranking members of the Demon Sect below half-knelt towards the direction of the forbidden area.
"Hahaha!"
Accompanied by a mighty voice reverberating through the heavens and earth, the members of the Demon Sect felt their ears buzz as they saw a fierce and domineering figure descend from the sky.
Instantly, his body, brimming with celestial energy, triggered changes in heaven and earth.
The entire headquarters seemed to be engulfed by the eerie wind and ghostly wails, making one feel as if they had fallen into the Netherworld.
"After ten years of seclusion, my Netherworld Divine Skill has broken into an unprecedented Twelfth Layer Realm, and the old fool of Celestial Sword cannot be arrogant for long. Order the sect to be prepared, for I shall soon head north to deal with that old fool, and the sect shall soon return to the Central Plains!"
Jue Wutian flicked his sleeve and sat down with authority in the chief seat, a heavy and oppressive aura sweeping across the entire headquarters.
"The Holy Lord’s divine skill is unparalleled, ruling the Martial World forever!"
The Demon Sect members shouted loudly,
Jue Wutian on the high platform looked down at the dense crowd of thousands in submission beneath his feet, his heart swelled with grandeur.
"Hahaha..."
His laughter thundered like storm clouds, sweeping across the four corners of Demon God Mountain, announcing his arrival.
Ten years ago, the brilliant Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian ascended to the Grandmaster realm, then led the Demon Sect on a massive invasion of the Central Plains.
For a time, the Southern lands were ablaze with fire, one force after another attacked and destroyed, placing the entire Central Plains Martial Arts world in peril.
In this crisis, the righteous path of the Central Plains invited the first Grandmaster under heaven, Celestial Sword Elder, to duel with the Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian on Dongting Lake.
That battle shattered the heavens and earth; Jue Wutian, newly ascended to Grandmaster, with unstable foundations, ultimately lost to the sword of Celestial Sword Elder, fleeing back to the Southern Wilderness in embarrassment.
Back at the Demon Sect headquarters, Jue Wutian sought to erase his shame, entering the forbidden area of Demon God Mountain in seclusion, hoping to break through the sect’s supreme Demon Scripture Netherworld Divine Skill to the Twelfth Layer, continuing until today.
In fact, three years ago, Jue Wutian’s Netherworld Divine Skill had already broken through to the Twelfth Layer, unprecedented and unmatched, subsequently spending time honing and stabilizing the realm, to increase his chances in the battle with Celestial Sword Elder.
Three years ago, the Demon Sect was ready to head north, and the massacre of the Celestial Essence Sect was precisely a probe arranged by Jue Wutian during his seclusion.
A large number of Demon Sect members gathered, and had prepared in the southern region of the Central Plains.
The great battle, about to erupt.
Dark clouds shrouded the sky, a storm was approaching.
"Hmm, where is Cyan Dragon? Only you three are here, where did Cyan Dragon run off to?"
Once the members dispersed, with only the Demon Sect high-ranking remaining around the headquarters, within the deep main hall of the Demon Sect headquarters, Jue Wutian squinted his eyes slightly, his thunderous voice echoing within the hall.
Three years ago, emboldened by his breakthrough to the Twelfth Layer of Netherworld Divine Skill, he sent forces north to probe.
The previous defeat against Celestial Sword Elder indeed taught him a lesson, making him more cautious than before.
Unexpectedly, having just broken through, his realm was not yet stable, subsequently requiring him to re-enter seclusion until today to complete his consolidation and emerge.
"To report to the Holy Lord, three years ago Cyan Dragon, under the Holy Lord’s command, led the sect north..."
The remaining three Demon Venerables exchanged glances, White Tiger stepped forward, narrating the events of three years ago.
Within the deep hall, silence prevailed, only the voice of White Tiger Venerable slowly echoing in the air, the atmosphere extremely oppressive.
After White Tiger finished narrating,
With a loud bang, Jue Wutian slammed his hand on the armrest beside him, causing the air to subtly twist and reverberate.
"Audacious! Daring to kill my men!"
The entire hall grew darker, the surrounding candlelight seemingly at its end, icy murderous intent nearly freezing upon the ground.
Jue Wutian’s gaze was deep, his sinister voice echoing:
"Very well, a mere newcomer, this time when I return to the Central Plains, before the showdown with Celestial Sword Elder, I need a Grandmaster’s head to offer to my banner!"
From the seat above, Jue Wutian slowly extended his hand, his face revealing a menacing expression.
A black vortex appeared in the void, devouring the light of the entire hall, at that moment, where Jue Wutian was, transformed into a giant black hole, absorbing all worldly radiance.
The failure ten years ago indeed restrained Jue Wutian’s arrogant demeanor somewhat.
But after ten years of seclusion, the sect’s divine skill already practiced to the historically only theorized Twelfth Layer Realm, greatly enhancing his strength, even facing the current number one martial artist under heaven, Celestial Sword Elder, he was not the least afraid, much less just a newcomer Grandmaster?
With his current power, facing his ten-year-ago self, he was confident in taking him down within fifty moves.
Though a Grandmaster is the peak of Martial World, Grandmasters among themselves ultimately differ!
"The Holy Lord’s divine skill is unparalleled, rule the Martial World forever!"
Feeling the presence of this Demon God-like abyssal Jue Wutian before them, the three Demon Venerables broke out in cold sweat, loudly shouting under the pressure of his mighty force.
"Hahaha!"
"Send a challenge to Celestial Sword Manor, see you on Dongting Lake in a month, to death or life!"
"Activate all operatives in the Central Plains! Locate that newcomer’s whereabouts! Before the decisive battle with Celestial Sword Elder, I want his head to announce my return to the Martial World!"
Jue Wushen’s darkly ominous gaze turned northward, as though piercing through layers of space, seeing the Celestial Sword standing tall on the Divine Land, his immense fighting spirit soaring to the sky.
His true enemy remained the one who dominated the Central Plains for decades, Celestial Sword Elder.
As for that Grandmaster from Celestial Essence Sect, just an appetizer before the main course!
Daring to provoke him, merely a casual matter to handle.

chapters.title: Chapter 342 - 013 Raid
chapters.content:
Chapter 342: Chapter 013 Raid
On the frontlines at the edge of the Hundred Thousand Mountains, stands an unnamed small town, several miles away from Xiangyun City.
The town is tiny, with such towns scattered across the Divine Land like stars in the sky.
Ordinarily, someone at the First and Second Level of the Postnatal Realm would be considered an expert in this town.
However, as the Martial Arts Origin Scripture spread, a multitude of martial artists flooded in, bringing a significant influx of people to this outpost deep in the Hundred Thousand Mountains.
The crowd bustled as martial artists from the Martial World mingled.
Major sects and forces sent their people to explore, and many hidden martial arts masters lurked in the shadows.
Nowadays, even someone with Innate abilities, once a rare sight, can be encountered casually on the streets.
"Look, those people are from the Celestial Essence Sect!"
"Is that the most outstanding figure of the Celestial Essence Sect’s younger generation, Zhang Feng? It’s unexpected that, after not being seen since the Martial Arts Conference years ago, he’s already advanced to the mid-Innate Realm. It’s said that he recently defeated Dai Zong, the Southwest Divine Traveler. No wonder he’s a leading figure of the young generation. It seems after Qingsong Zhenren’s death, the Celestial Essence Sect finally has a successor."
"Hey, brother, you’re not quite right. Zhang Feng may be formidable, but in front of that person from Celestial Essence, what would that make him? It’s just a pity that those guys from Celestial Essence missed the greatest opportunity for sect revitalization due to their mediocrity."
"Indeed, the True Dragon has hidden for years, and yet their insight is lacking. No wonder one of the Martial Arts Sacred Lands has declined till now."
"Heh, even if they realized it, what use would it be? For me, if I didn’t wipe out Celestial Essence, that’d be a grace itself. And to think they helped them kill Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable and repelled the Demon Sect’s assault. Grandmaster Li, truly acts with noble intent."
On the streets, Zhang Feng led a group of Celestial Essence Sect disciples walking by.
Recognizing them, those around began to chatter, and some disciples from other sects directly voiced their ridicule.
The purple-clad young woman behind Zhang Feng looked indignant, glaring at those mocking voices, ready to draw her sword in anger.
"Junior sister, there’s no need for anger. Don’t cause trouble here."
A hand suddenly reached out, unobtrusively blocking the sword the young woman was about to draw.
It was Zhang Feng, striding nonchalantly ahead.
"Oh my, a little firecracker here, such a pretty little doll. You’ve offended the Demon Sect, and your forlorn sect is about to crumble. Why not hurry and find yourself a husband? Then you’d have someone to lean on, hahahaha."
At this, with a sarcastic voice, the purple-clad young woman fumed once more.
"Little junior sister, they are nothing but loudmouth cowards."
Seeing her senior brother’s stern gaze, the young woman could only step back in frustration.
Seeing her junior sister’s face torn between grievance and anger, Zhang Feng had to gently explain.
"Those people are merely from sects opposed to ours. In the past, they’ve said far worse, but they’re just cowards fleetingly flaunting their bravado. If our sect weren’t facing hard times and needed to lie low, wouldn’t senior brother already vent your anger? Those guys were nothing more than my defeated opponents at the Martial Arts Conference a few years ago."
Hearing Zhang Feng’s explanation, the purple-clad young woman calmed down a bit.
Still, she appeared somewhat discontented, muttering under her breath.
"Senior brother, isn’t that person from the same cohort as you? Why doesn’t he lend a hand? If he just showed his face, our Celestial Essence Sect wouldn’t need to suffer such humiliation today."
Naturally, she referred to Grandmaster Li Hu, who emerged on the scene three years ago.
Despite the Celestial Essence Sect suffering significant blows during the Demon Sect’s attack, the entire Martial World knew that if that individual merely expressed slight intent, the Celestial Essence Sect would once again ascend as a Martial Arts Sacred Land.
But since the day he killed Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable, Li Hu has vanished without a trace.
Today, the Celestial Essence Sect, guarding its assets, has no choice but to tread carefully.
Toward Li Hu, every disciple of the Celestial Essence Sect harbors complex feelings.
"It’s not like that. Though he was from the same batch as me, I only vaguely have an impression of him. We hardly share any relationship."
Zhang Feng slightly shook his head, his tone complex as he spoke.
His feelings about Li Hu were mixed with both admiration and envy.
If not for that person, he would have already been the star across the Martial World, the young generation’s leader.
But due to that person’s appearance, Zhang Feng’s brilliance, which could have shone in any era, was overshadowed like stars before the sun.
A Grandmaster under twenty, such a feat, is simply too extraordinary and unimaginable.
For ages past, perhaps there’d only be this one instance.
Except, amidst that dazzling brilliance, living in the same era was the sorrow of all young martial geniuses.
Once that person emerged, they had already reached the peak that countless spend their entire lives failing to reach, standing atop the Martial World.
The extreme realm countless dream of, was, in his hands, easily achieved, seeing all fame and fortune as nothing.
Such talent and heart left Zhang Feng nothing but compelled admiration.
"That person not making a move, surely has his reasons. We just need to do our best and strive to develop Celestial Essence Sect."
Zhang Feng spoke somewhat ambiguously, brushing things aside.
Though the Celestial Essence Sect had taken him in, the deaths of his parents and some past unsavory incidents in Celestial Essence weren’t suitable for detailed discussion with his junior sister.
For Li Hu’s decision, Zhang Feng understood.
Relying on others is worse than relying on oneself. Although that man hailed from Celestial Essence, there wasn’t much affection to speak of. Their visit to this small town was to see if they had the chance to attain the Martial Ancestor’s legacy, gain the Martial Arts Origin Scripture, and alter the awkward circumstances of Celestial Essence today.
After the street taunts, the group’s pace quickened.
In the town, people came and went.
Within the bustling streets and towns, undercurrents surged invisibly.
However, since this area was within the Central Plains, where righteous forces flourished, no significant disturbances arose within the town.
All sect leaders and Innate elders only contended in the shadows, without openly displaying confrontations.
This unnamed town, to return to peace, would likely require a year and half of time, until all martial artists left in frustration after achieving nothing, it might gradually regain tranquility.
Suddenly,
as Zhang Feng led the Celestial Essence Sect members toward the inn, sneers and mockeries arose from the martial artists behind them, with hawkers selling goods all around and carts rumbling down the central road.
All appeared utterly calm when,
at the inn of the unnamed town, a terrifying aura burst forth like thunder, several figures soaring into the air.
Boom!!!
The void trembled, with expansive aura surging skyward, prompting a change in celestial secrets above, the oppressive aura swept across the entire world like a tide.
"Li Hu, three years ago you killed people of our Holy Sect, today our Sect Leader emerges from seclusion, we shall take your head to toast the Sect Leader!"

chapters.title: Chapter 343 - 14: Joint Attack and Assassination
chapters.content:
Chapter 343: Chapter 14: Joint Attack and Assassination
Since that day when he left Xiangyun City, Li Hu has followed the paths of the majority of martial artists in the Martial World, arriving at an unnamed small town.
He naturally does not know where the relics of the Martial Ancestor are, but as a stronghold most deeply entrenched in the Wilderness Mountains, it is currently teeming with all sorts of people from the three religions and nine schools of thought in the Martial Arts. One might get lucky and learn some news.
Therefore, he undertook his main trade and disguised as an innkeeper, dutifully working in the inn.
An inn is always a good place to gather information.
Although Li Hu’s reputation is tremendous, the destruction of the Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable with a single strike in Celestial Essence shook the entire Martial Arts world.
But in reality, very few in the Martial Arts community can recognize him by appearance.
In these three years, he has overheard others discussing him more than once,
and little did those people know that the servant serving tea and sweeping the floor beside them was the sweeping master, the fourth Grandmaster famed throughout the world!
Within the inn, Li Hu continued his cultivation in seclusion while using his powerful Spiritual Power to eavesdrop on information.
As he expected, these wandering martial artists would always reveal some traces, and by comparing these clues and calculating on the map, Li Hu has roughly estimated the area of the valley perilous land reached by that lucky Hunter back then.
Through the Martial Arts Origin Scripture, Li Hu has already gleaned some of the mystical ideals of the Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor from ancient times, seeing the great paths they had walked through space-time.
Li Hu is certain that,
the Martial Ancestor must have been a Celestial Human level expert,
or even beyond!
That is the realm of the founding master of Martial Arts, a level never reached by any second person in history.
To create their own world and path, truly deserving of the title of ancestor.
During these days of comprehending the Martial Arts Origin Scripture, although Li Hu has seen some of the mysteries above the Grandmaster realm in the Celestial Human Realm, he still lacks a stroke of Spiritual Mechanism to step into that Celestial Human Realm.
Heavenly Stone.
In those years, during the Dao discussion between the Martial Ancestor and Dao Ancestor, a Heavenly Stone descended from the sky, which the Martial Ancestor comprehended for seven days and nights, thus founding the path of Qi Cultivation in Martial Arts.
What Li Hu lacks, that missing stroke of Spiritual Mechanism, is the Heavenly Stone.
Now that he has found a clue, Li Hu does not intend to wait any longer.
Early in the morning, he went to the market, negotiated a fair price with Wang, the vegetable delivery man, and purchased a batch of vegetables.
Passing by a rice shop, he ordered three big bags of rice according to the shopkeeper’s instruction.
Having completed these menial tasks, on his way back he encountered Zhang Feng and his entourage from the Celestial Essence Sect.
This was Li Hu’s first encounter with Zhang Feng.
When he was secluded for cultivation in the Library of the Celestial Essence Sect back then, Zhang Feng’s name was well-known, but he hadn’t seen him much face-to-face.
Seeing that scene on the long street,
Li Hu paid no mind, nor did he linger, he directly moved on.
With the affairs of this body, that strike from years ago has already fully repaid everything.
The crowd from the Celestial Essence Sect did not know that among the dense crowd, the person they were discussing was just brushing past them.
Returning to the inn, after preparing all of today’s work, Li Hu intended to quit his job with the innkeeper.
The innkeeper pleaded with him to stay repeatedly, for someone like Li Hu, who worked diligently without pay, was always beneficial to the inn.
But Li Hu had already made up his mind,
not just to explore the remnants left by the Martial Ancestor in the Wilderness Forest, seeking that Heavenly Stone.
More so because these days, his Spiritual Sense told him some trouble was coming for him.
Li Hu does not fear trouble, but he hates it, hence he prepared to leave.
However, what was meant to come could not be avoided.
With a declaration resonating through the sky, three Grandmaster Level auras bloomed in the sky, sweeping like a tsunami in all directions, stirring up violent tempests.
"Die!!!"
A dark star, accompanied by an aura as sharp as a master, suddenly descended from the sky, swirling into a fierce gale over the entire long street, countless razor-sharp fragmented energies like a Milky Way waterfall crashing down from the heavens!
At the same time,
A figure whose appearance on the long street went unnoticed detonated the energy under its feet like a bomb, the ground shattering with a roar, debris splintering outward in all directions, and the entire figure transformed into a gray lightning bolt with sheer formidable energy sprinting forward.
At the same moment, a soft hand unexpectedly broke through the void, coming forth mightily, the currents of air all around drawn by its True Qi, undulating unpredictably like the tides, layers of power piling up, crashing towards Li Hu’s back.
The three appeared so quickly, their attack arrived too hastily,
In a blink, from above, in front, and behind, the three deadly strikes closed off all space for Li Hu to evade.
"That is... Grandmasters! A siege by three Grandmasters!"
In a flash, as the three unleashed their overwhelming momentum, all the martial artists present turned pale in shock.
Every Grandmaster is an exceptional master of great rarity in the Martial World, capable of founding their sect and dominating a region.
Yet today, three Grandmasters unexpectedly appeared together to strike?!
In an instant, their combined deadly strike had reached Li Hu, leaving him nowhere to escape, nowhere to hide!
Li Hu stood there in a daze, seemingly unable to react, as if resigned to his fate.
The three figures, in that moment, revealed vicious smiles on their faces, they had planned and laid ambush here for a long time, their concentrated killer move was impactful even for a Grandmaster to endure.
To use Grandmasters to counterattack a Grandmaster, achieving an almost nonexistent feat in the history of the Martial Arts, was about to occur at their hands!
"I have no intent to kill others, why then do they come courting death?"
The eerie voice reached their ears, before they could react,
Suddenly,
The person before them "disappeared"!
Not in the literal sense of vanishing, for his figure was still right there, but at that moment, he became nonexistent, became nothing.
The void was profound, formless, and shapeless.
His entire strength seemed to plunge into the endless void.
Li Hu’s entire being seemed to vanish from the world, though his figure was clearly in sight, it was as if he had disappeared between heaven and earth.
"Not good!"
The trio became greatly alarmed in their hearts, a sense of extreme danger loomed above them.
However, there was no time to change their move.
A palm descended, as if hitting the void.
Their whole existence seemed to disappear from the world, though his silhouette was right before their eyes, yet it seemed as if he had vanished from the realms.
Assembling all the strength of a Grandmaster’s full strike, vast and grand force instantly dispersed.
Vaguely, before their eyes, a yin-yang shadow loomed, and the next moment,
Boom boom boom!
An even more terrifying, indescribable force struck their chests, as if heaven and earth collapsed, earth’s fire erupted, tides surged...
The three Grandmaster-level experts, with even faster speed, were knocked back, like cannonballs crashing heavily into buildings, collapsing several houses with a boom.

chapters.title: Chapter 344 - 015 The Authority of the Grandmaster
chapters.content:
Chapter 344: Chapter 015 The Authority of the Grandmaster
The three figures attacked quickly, but retreated even more swiftly.
Like cannonballs, they flew backward and smashed into the surrounding houses.
Boom! Boom! Boom!
The continuous rumble shook the entire town. Large areas of houses collapsed, and dust and wood chips swept up, creating a whirlwind on the street like a tsunami, as if a mountain flood was pouring down the street.
In a flash, before everyone could react, the overwhelmingly strong three streams of energy had already been blown away and defeated.
Countless Martial Artists gathered there were shocked and scattered like headless flies, screaming and fleeing in panic.
"A Grandmaster battle! Who is that young man?!"
"Li Hu, the Grandmaster who appeared at the Celestial Essence Sect three years ago! Those three are the four Demon Venerables of the Demon Sect? They were defeated so quickly!"
"Indeed, three years ago, when the sweeper Li Hu appeared and killed the Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable with one palm, he became famous throughout the land. The Demon Sect is here for revenge this time!"
"Earlier, that Demon Venerable said the Demon Sect Leader has emerged. Is the martial world about to be thrown into chaos again?"
One after another, the Martial Artists felt the explosive surges of energy and fled in all directions, looking fearfully at the distant place where dust and smoke rose into the sky.
Heart Spirit!
The sudden outbreak of battle and the explosive energy scattered Martial Artists within a hundred meters, sending them flying, spitting blood, and getting injured.
The power of a Grandmaster battle, with energy waves affecting dozens of yards away!
But the sweeper was clearly more terrifying as, under the combined attack of three Grandmasters, he resolved this deadly offensive with ease and dealt a heavy blow instead!
Severely wounding the three Demon Venerables in one move, Li Hu showed no sign of joy on his face.
Standing quietly in place, his gaze deep.
Looking at the empty street ahead, as if trying to see a flower there.
The air was silent, and no one around dared to make a sound.
Suddenly, the sun in the sky seemed to stretch infinitely, and the distance of space became extremely vast.
At that moment, all the colors of the world seemed to gather on Li Hu, a profound and mysterious atmosphere spread, like dust entering everywhere, infecting the mind of every Martial Artist present.
After an unknown amount of time, a calm voice suddenly echoed in the air.
"Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian? Aren’t you planning to make a move yet?"
The tone was calm, without a ripple.
As that voice spread, it was like a stone dropped into a calm lake, breaking the mirror-like stillness, and the Martial Artists around finally woke up from that vast and serene atmosphere.
Only at this moment did everyone realize with shock,
The Grandmaster’s casually emitted aura had infected and assimilated their Heart Spirit in that instant!
Many people were astonished, their expressions changing, quickly backtracking several dozen yards to avoid being affected by that terrifying Grandmaster’s aura again.
"Hahahaha!"
Suddenly, a thunderous laughter came from the sky, like a clear sky explosion, terrifying energy rippled from the distance, making every Martial Artist in the nameless town feel as if they had fallen into a dark abyss.
"Senior Brother...."
On a distant street, among the travelers of the Celestial Essence Sect, a young woman in purple was pale, feeling a terrifying tremor descending from the sky above.
"Don’t be afraid, his target is not us, let’s leave!"
Looking at the dimming sky in the distance, Zhang Feng was also shocked.
Unlike his juniors and juniors, with his mid-Innate cultivation, he could already feel the vast energy surging from the high sky, like a black sun falling from the sky, creating an overwhelming aura!
Just the residual wave alone made him feel an inescapable terror!
Zhang Feng clearly felt that if he faced that vast aura, he might not even dare to draw his sword before being easily crushed by its owner.
Grandmaster!
This is a Grandmaster,
A casually emitted Heart Spirit that infected over half the Martial Artists in the town with its aura.
The other hasn’t even arrived, yet the overwhelming pressure has dimmed the sky.
This is the power at the pinnacle of Martial Arts!
"Let’s go!"
Zhang Feng, along with his juniors from the Celestial Essence Sect, quickly flew away, while Martial Artists in the nameless town also scattered like birds and beasts, rapidly fleeing the town.
This place is about to become a Grandmaster’s battlefield!
Rumble!
As the Martial Artists fled in all directions, a muffled thunder sounded from the sky, and overlapping dark clouds unknowingly covered the entire sky, veiling the daylight, making the area instantly dark and deep, as if excluded from the world.
Under the dark clouds, everyone inexplicably felt a fear, as if facing an impending apocalypse, an invisible pressure almost driving them insane.
"Grandmaster! Grandmaster!"
An old Martial Artist shouted madly, eyes wide, witnessing the scene of the changing sky before him.
The surrounding crowd fled in panic, a chaotic scene.
The old Martial Artist knelt toward the sky covered by dark clouds, arms stretched wide, appearing prominently.
"Hearing the Tao in the morning, I would die content by evening! Grandmaster, ah, Grandmaster!"
He shouted, tears streaming down his face.
According to legends, when Martial Arts reaches its peak, it can alter heaven and earth, shatter mountains, and break ridges.
A lifetime of practicing Martial Arts seemed futile, but ultimately he could witness the resplendent Realm he pursued all his life before dying.
Instantly he sobbed with tears and mucus.
Crash! Crash!
Under the gloomy sky, a figure like a dark meteor fell from the heavens, absorbing the surrounding light, making half the sky darken.
The overwhelming darkness swept in all directions, revealing the figure like a demon bringing a dark abyss to the world.
"Are you Li Hu, who ascended to the Grandmaster Realm three years ago?"
The figure of the Demon Sect Leader, Jue Wutian, appeared high above like a dark overlord, looking down on Li Hu on the ground with indifferent eyes, as if looking at a dead person.
"Correct, reaching the pinnacle of Martial Arts at your age, you are qualified to stand in the same position as me. However, you shouldn’t have, under any circumstances, dared to touch my people!"
"You should take your own life."
The tone was filled with undeniable divine authority.
Clearly words condemning someone to death, yet filled with an order from on high.
Silence, no sound.
Li Hu stood there, a calm expression on his face.
The surrounding space was silent.
Li Hu didn’t speak, and Jue Wutian remained high above without a word.
After a long time,
"Forget it, I see you are not one to willingly die, so I’ll reluctantly send you into Reincarnation instead."

chapters.title: Chapter 345 - 016 Netherworld Divine Skill
chapters.content:
Chapter 345: Chapter 016 Netherworld Divine Skill
If this Martial Arts World is a world within a novel, then the experience of the Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian is a history of Long Aotian’s growth.
As the only son of the previous generation’s Demon Sect Leader, he attracted the attention of the entire Martial World as soon as he was born, and his Martial Arts aptitude could be called heaven-defying.
At five years old, he started Qi Cultivation; at ten, he had reached the pinnacle of the Postnatal stage; by twenty, he had already advanced to the Realm of a Grandmaster.
In the Central Plains Martial Arts, the Sword Young Master, who was called the number one genius of the younger generation a few years ago, was actually nothing compared to the previous generation’s Jue Wutian, only because the orthodox path of Central Plains was flourishing, they deliberately concealed Jue Wutian’s shocking talent, thus Sword Young Master was in the dominant position.
Since the age of thirty, Jue Wutian roamed the Martial World, unbeaten, advancing to the status of a Grandmaster with an invincible aura.
Later, the Demon Sect marched north on a large scale, facing off against the current top martial artist in the world, the elderly Celestial Sword, over Dongting Lake.
It was then that he experienced the first defeat of his life.
Even so, no one dared to underestimate him.
Everyone knew that with Jue Wutian’s formidable talent and youthful advantage, surpassing the elderly Celestial Sword to become the number one martial artist in the Martial World was only a matter of time.
Since his defeat at Dongting Lake, Jue Wutian secluded himself in the forbidden grounds of the Demon Sect, and it has now been ten years.
No one knows to what extent Jue Wutian will reach upon re-emerging after ten years.
But it can be confirmed that Jue Wutian’s return will surely unleash a catastrophe upon the Central Plains Martial Arts!
An invincible path has endowed Jue Wutian with an invincible nature.
Perhaps in the eyes of others, Jue Wutian’s actions are arrogant and overbearing, but in his own eyes, he sees it as a matter of course.
Letting a Grandmaster commit suicide may seem absurd to others, but he truly believes so.
"Or perhaps you’ve reached the peak of the Martial Arts and think you can contend with me, then let me show you that there’s a huge difference even between Grandmasters!"
With an indifferent tone, Jue Wutian slightly raised his palm and waved gently toward Li Hu.
BOOM!!!
Accompanied by a deafening explosion, a pitch-black vortex suddenly appeared above Li Hu, devouring everything around it like a black hole.
All the myriad lights were swallowed in, and the entire space dimmed, as if the vacuum had collapsed.
Netherworld Devouring Heaven!
Whoosh!
As if a huge hole collapsed in the ocean, countless air surged like tidal waves, the surrounding houses collapsed, and wood and stone thrown into the air were swept into it like a flood.
The black hole, with a diameter of several meters and infinite might, plummeted toward Li Hu!
The surrounding void seemed to solidify at this moment, and the incomparably powerful force acted on Li Hu, making him feel as if he was fixed in place, unable to move, only able to watch as the black hole in front of him engulfed him.
"Netherworld Divine Skill! The highest sacred law of the Southern Demon Sect, the Netherworld Divine Skill!"
Martial Artists who fled far away looked toward the direction of the small town, seeing the twisted void and dimmed light, as if a vortex of black sun manifesting vacuum, even their sight and Divine Soul seemed to be absorbed into it, looking shocked.
"Rumor has it that when the Netherworld Divine Skill is cultivated to the Twelfth Layer, it can devour the vacuum, drawing all things into the Netherworld Reincarnation, but wasn’t that only fictional in theoretical inference? Could it be that Jue Wutian has already cultivated the Netherworld Divine Skill to the Twelfth Layer?!"
"It must be, I saw with my own eyes the duel between Jue Wutian and Celestial Sword ten years ago, at that time Jue Wutian’s Netherworld Divine Skill definitely hadn’t been this powerful!"
"It’s over, that janitor is sure to lose; the Twelfth Layer of the Netherworld Divine Skill, perhaps in the entire Martial Arts World, only the Celestial Intent Swordsmanship of the elderly Celestial Sword, with the Hongtian Sword, could resist, but the janitor has only been a Grandmaster for three years, how could he withstand it."
"What a pity, if the janitor were given another ten years with his astonishing talent, he might have been able to contend with Jue Wutian in the future, but acting imprudently today is leading to his downfall."
A veteran Grandmaster outside the small town with insight spoke.
This time, the Martial Ancestor ruins have emerged, a mingling of dragons and serpents, with even a veteran Grandmaster who had been reclusive for a long time appearing here.
As an elder in the Martial World, of course, he knows some deeper truths.
The origin of the Netherworld Divine Skill is mysterious, possessing all sorts of incredible divine powers. In the battle at Dongting Lake years ago between Celestial Sword and Jue Wutian, it was because of unfamiliarity with the Netherworld Divine Skill that Celestial Sword suffered considerable losses.
Back then, Jue Wutian’s Netherworld Divine Skill was at the Eleventh Layer and was already like this. When it reaches the Twelfth Layer, perhaps the only martial technique in the Martial Arts World that can contend with it would be the Celestial Intent Swordsmanship of the elderly Celestial Sword.
"What a pity, if Li Hu had fled from the start, he might have escaped with his life, but now it’s a dead end, and after the elderly Celestial Sword is gone, who will be Jue Wutian’s rival?"
Looking at the dimly lit wind-stirring vortex of the black hole in front of him, the veteran Grandmaster couldn’t help but frown, as if he already saw a future where the Central Plains Martial Arts plunged into great calamity.
Facing the dark void above, which even swallowed the vacuum, a glimmer flashed in Li Hu’s otherwise calm eyes.
"Twelfth Layer of Netherworld Divine Skill? Interesting..."
A few years ago, he traveled the world, collecting various Martial Arts to strengthen his own foundation.
With his powerful Spiritual Power and various methods, the Divine Skill Secret Manuals of different sects were completely unguarded; entering various Scripture Pavilions and secret territories was as if entering an uninhabited land, unnoticed by anyone.
This included the Southern Demon Sect as well.
The Netherworld Divine Skill was long backed up in his mind.
At that time, he even spent some time studying it.
Although not practiced, some essential Techniques within that skill gave him quite a bit of inspiration.
Without mastering it, one naturally doesn’t grasp its true mysteries.
Furthermore, the Twelfth Layer of the Netherworld Divine Skill only exists in theoretical imagination.
From the black vortex unleashed by Jue Wutian, Li Hu vaguely perceived a sense of shattering space.
It couldn’t really be considered space-shattering, but the technique of devouring all things, concentrating power at an extreme point to achieve a space-devouring technique, greatly enlightened him.
"A very fine technique, among the top tier in Martial Arts history, but alas..."
In a low murmur, Li Hu stopped hesitating and suddenly took action.
In an instant, like a burst of Celestial Intent, myriad flows converged!

chapters.title: Chapter 346 - 17 Netherworld Devouring Heaven
chapters.content:
Chapter 346: Chapter 17 Netherworld Devouring Heaven
If Jue Wutian’s existence is like a black sun swallowing everything into darkness, casting the sky into a black abyss beneath shrouded clouds,
then Li Hu’s presence resembles the natural manifestation of heaven and earth, with Daoist techniques appearing before people.
At the initial stage of learning martial arts, Li Hu’s foundation was merely a book of the Nourishing Essence Technique.
But precisely because it was the most fundamental martial arts, Li Hu, like a blank canvas, could absorb the essence of other martial arts secret manuals during his subsequent growth.
A collection of myriad martial arts, in Li Hu’s body, blossomed into the most radiant martial arts flower.
"Dao Yuan Wuji·Qiankun Qi!"
One gives birth to two, two gives birth to three, and three gives birth to all things.
In that instant, even martial artists who had fled far from the town seemed to feel the world infinitely extending, experiencing a soul’s elevation, as if the dust on their spiritual self was swept away, entering a new and vast realm.
Even at a distance of hundreds of feet, the gathered martial artists felt their spirits affected by the spiritual mechanism that painted the void.
Even those at the Innate Level, considered experts in the martial world, were drawn into this void returning to origin, as if entering the ancient beginning when Daoist techniques manifested, immersed in boundless mystical concepts.
In a trance, the martial artists seemed to see the opening of heaven and earth, the two forces of yin and yang generating all things, the clear rising, the turbid falling, with swirling clouds below forming ripples of water, gradually becoming a storm of waves surging to the heavens, while above, like a canopy, swirling into groups, radiating brilliant beams.
"Not good! What martial art is this!!!"
Hidden among the crowd, several grandmasters were horrified, their eyes revealing a look of terror.
Martial artists around stood in place, mesmerized by the mystical aura, gazing into the distance with a look of intoxicated fascination on their faces.
Even those at the Innate Level could not escape the infection on their divine soul spiritual mechanism.
Only those few grandmasters who broke into the Innate Realm could barely stir their aura to resist the invasion from the Daoist technique’s divine soul, barely maintaining a clear spirit.
"Retreat quickly!"
Several grandmasters were utterly terrified, retreating repeatedly, withdrawing a hundred feet before stopping at a high place where the nameless small town was the size of a grindstone, watching in fear the sky darkening beneath the clouds.
It is said in legends that those who reach the pinnacle of martial arts possess the power to change the day and night.
As it stands now, although not truly having the ability to change the day and night, just the mere aftermath of the energy from battle holds power akin to immortal gods!
At this moment, within the small town,
space swayed, swinging rapidly like a mirror, the entire nameless small town collapsing into ruins after successive waves of energy rampage.
Rumble!!!
A world-shaking collision suddenly erupted, layers of air currents surged skyward, raising clouds of dust and debris, sweeping outward in all directions.
The grandmasters watching from afar saw the small town before them suddenly erupt into a tsunami at that moment, visible waves of energy spreading around, houses collapsing like a mountain torrent forming a tidal storm, pouring past the ruins.
Even at a distance of hundreds of feet, the grandmasters could feel the power of the powerful energy whistling around.
But in the small town, the surrounding void twisted under the collision of two mighty and terrifying energies, like a mirror.
The void swayed, dreamlike and illusory.
Jue Wutian’s Heart Spirit became serious in this moment as well.
The strength of this youth likely has but a small gap from himself.
"I didn’t expect you could reach this step, and your martial arts are also quite extraordinary.."
Though it was just a probing exchange, he had already felt the prowess of this youth named Li Hu before him.
Originally, having broken through the Twelfth Layer of the Netherworld Divine Skill, confident of being invincible in the world, Jue Wutian had to admit.
In a life-and-death struggle, this person before him might inflict injuries on him during their desperate final fight.
This was not part of his plan.
Soon, he was to challenge the Celestial Sword Elder again to avenge the shame of defeat years ago.
Despite his confidence in the power of his Twelfth Layer Netherworld Divine Skill, dealing with a grandmaster suppressing the martial world for decades, he must be in a complete state, at least.
This youth in front of him is, after all, an incidental person. While confident in slaying this fellow, in a desperate fight, he might not retreat unscathed.
After some time, after killing the Celestial Sword Elder, wouldn’t he have time to deal with this guy?
His gaze flickered as he weighed it in his heart, and Jue Wutian calmly said:
"Apparently, being able to kill Cyan Dragon with one palm wasn’t just luck; I acknowledge your strength."
Despite saying so, Jue Wutian’s tone remained arrogant.
"Among the billions in the martial world, grandmasters are few and far between, the fall of one is ultimately a great loss to the martial world, so why should we engage in a life-and-death struggle? If you and I join forces, we could sweep the entire Central Plains Martial World, standing high among billions of beings, wouldn’t that be better?"
Li Hu, noncommittal, said indifferently:
"What if I say no?"
Silence, with not a sound in the air.
A supremely oppressive killing intent spread, the space seemed to freeze at that moment.
For a long time, Jue Wutian looked down at Li Hu with an indifferent gaze.
"Those who follow me prosper, those who oppose me perish, refuse, and then die!"
The words were spoken plainly.
But filled with an undeniable implication.
"How about it?"
Li Hu raised his head, with a brilliant mysterious light shining in his pupils.
At that moment, his entire presence surged like a volcanic eruption, as if the rhythm of heaven and earth descended upon the mortal realm.
A cold voice resonated between the void.
"No matter, join forces or not, dominate the martial world or not, it matters not to me, I just want to beat you to death now!"
Having grown utterly weary of Jue Wutian’s attitude, Li Hu was too lazy to speak further.
To deal with such an all-encompassing, self-important Long Aotian, the best way is with fists.
Only force is the real truth!
"Very well! Since you seek death, then I shall fulfill you!"
Jue Wutian showed neither sorrow nor joy, his whole body’s energy suddenly burst forth like wind and thunder, like a tsunami, suddenly covering hundreds of feet radius of the void.
The grandmaster-level energy resonances immediately altered the weather, bringing on howling black winds, as if the Netherworld Ghost Land had descended to the mortal world.
"To kill you, one move is enough!"
Jue Wutian’s expression was calm, spreading his hands wide.
The black wind grew fiercer, as if malevolent ghosts howled between heaven and earth, the sunlight above entirely obscured by clouds, fell into a gloomy domain.
Boom!!!
With a roar, the Netherworld Divine Skill erupted inside, his palms suddenly manifested clusters of black void whirlpools, slowly rotating, tearing and devouring even the void.
An incredibly pure darkness, like a black hole, swallowed all the surrounding light, engulfing all radiance of the world, as if expelling this realm from existence.
Netherworld Devouring Heaven!
Rustle!
The black vortex rapidly expanded, spreading out in all directions.

chapters.title: Chapter 347 - 018: Void Collapse
chapters.content:
Chapter 347: Chapter 018: Void Collapse
Two black holes, resembling black suns, revolved in the void, shaking the firmament. Just the emission of their aura stirred the Celestial Secret Aura violently like tidal waves, sweeping across a hundred zhang, as if drawing that entire space into a dark abyss.
The space was torn and twisted, like a massive void opening in the sea, immense air rushing in like surging tides, and within it, unimaginably terrifying power was coalescing.
Netherworld Devouring Heaven, one of the supreme techniques of the Twelfth Layer of Netherworld Divine Skill, is said to possess the ability to devour the heavens and earth, bringing the dark Netherworld down to the mortal realm.
This move was originally Jue Wutian’s trump card against the Elder of the Celestial Sword.
But now, to kill Li Hu without damage, Jue Wutian had no choice but to use this technique he had prepared for ten years.
"Just right, use the blood of a Grandmaster to consecrate the birth of Netherworld Devouring Heaven!"
Jue Wutian’s face showed a ruthless expression,
only to see his hands come together, and the two void vortex black holes merged into one, transforming into a massive black hole several zhang in diameter.
As if a black sun descended upon the human world, the void trembled.
"Go!"
As Jue Wutian pressed downwards, that vortex of black hole, seemingly devouring everything in the world, fell towards Li Hu with a roar.
The surrounding void violently shook and swayed, countless spaces stretched and compressed, surging towards that black sun.
The nearby space seemed to solidify at this moment, powerful forces acting on Li Hu, as if trying to swallow both him and the surrounding void into that deep black hole.
"Netherworld Divine Skill, practiced to the extreme, can produce such changes, perhaps..."
Some thought flashed through his mind.
The next moment, a vast aura surged from his body, carrying an ethereal, otherworldly aura, stirring the entire world’s void.
"For Thunder, it is the pivot of heaven and earth..."
A light chant, a clear voice echoed in the void, the aura around him woven with the mysterious forces of heaven and earth.
Yin-Yang Qiankun: Thunder Heavenly Punishment!
BOOM!!!
An arc of lightning, stretching several hundred zhang, suddenly flashed between the dark clouds above, tearing through the sky, as if opening a rift in the void. From within exploded countless lightning sparks, merging with the heavenly aura, immediately transforming into bolts of lightning erupting in the void.
Thunder and lightning, this majestic power of heaven and earth, at this moment, was actually summoned and used by Li Hu!
In the Main World, Li Hu was already a master of thunder, having awakened the Thunder Law Origin within the Giant Dragon, adeptly using various Thunder Magics. His comprehension of thunder had reached a very profound level.
In this world, though there was no fundamental existence of Magic Power,
but the deep understanding of Thunder Power and some application of Thunderbolt Power, in essence, were connected.
Li Hu, through refining and evolving certain extraordinary Thunder Attribute techniques from the martial world for his own use, drew upon the pivot of heaven and earth, creating this Grandmaster Level pinnacle technique of commanding thunder and rendering divine punishment with unfathomable might.
ZIZLA!
Countless electric lights gathered in the void at this moment, transforming into a sword containing myriad thunders, as if a star river of devastation!
When that Thunderbolt Divine Sword appeared in the void, it stirred the Celestial Secret Aura between heaven and earth, turbulent like a tide, roaring as if earthfire surged, boiling up.
"Commanding thunder? Mastering the might of heavenly punishment with human power, how is this possible?!!!"
From afar, martial artists, left in an extremely disheveled state by the previous impact, widened their eyes in shock.
That Thunderbolt Divine Sword stood suspended in the void, its brilliant light shining, electric arcs and sparks radiating in all directions, causing the firmament above to seem transformed into a sea of thunder, with bolts of lightning blooming, emitting roaring thunderous booms, and its blinding light illuminating the entire world.
"It is said that reaching the peak of martial arts, one possesses incredible powers akin to Immortals. The Martial Ancestor who founded martial arts once suppressed the world single-handedly, possessing divine might capable of shattering ten thousand armies with one hand. Previously thought to be mere myth, it now seems such abilities akin to Immortal Gods truly exist!"
Even strong Grandmaster-level experts under this awe-inspiring heavenly might felt no more significant than ants, capable of being obliterated with a wave of a hand!
Even a Martial Arts Grandmaster could not withstand the might of a single stroke of thunderous divine punishment!
At the same moment, concealed within the massive black hole vortex, Jue Wutian also felt an inexplicable trepidation.
Watching as the black hole vortex, with the power to devour void and earth, fell with a roar, Li Hu did not linger.
"Go!"
With a distant point, the Thunderbolt Divine Sword suspended in the void in front swiftly thrust out.
As if traversing through space, wandering in the void,
In one moment it was before him, the next it appeared dozens of zhang away.
In the space, just a fleeting flash of disappearing light, the Thunderbolt Divine Sword, forged by thunder, brilliant as a star river, brought the awe-inspiring might of heavenly punishment, with a momentum capable of seizing the brilliance of heaven and earth, crashing towards the black hole vortex triggered by Netherworld Devouring Heaven.
CRACK!
At that moment, the entire world seemed to split and collapse into two halves.
At the boundary, cracks in the void spread out, space appearing like glass with spiderweb-like fissures, crisscrossing and spreading.
From afar, martial artists observing were already dumbfounded, deathly silent.
The space, unexpectedly shattered!
Watching this scene unfold before his eyes, Li Hu’s gaze also radiated a dazzling brilliance, like reflecting a sun instantly lighting up.
"Shattered void..."
Li Hu murmured softly, already imprinting the scene before him into his formidable spirit.
Then,
he decided to no longer hold back.
RUSTLE!
The ethereal aura traversed the Cyan Nether, crossing the nine heavens and ten earths, majestic like a heavenly river, in an instant sweeping several li.
At this moment, Li Hu’s peak Grandmaster Level aura, fully blossomed.
The mighty aura surged into the firmament, stirring changes in winds and clouds, the sky dimming, as a shadow arose blocking all light from heaven and earth.
Like a comet crashing into the atmosphere, shaking the land for several li, that incomparably strong wave of power struck the Celestial Secret Aura with unparalleled speed, violently shaking the entire world!
This power of aura far surpassed Jue Wutian!
"How is this possible!"
Jue Wutian’s expression drastically changed, showing incredulous shock.
This was the first time during battle that his expression drastically shifted,
a once confident battle now suddenly turned disastrous, as if in an instant descended into ruinous peril!
This radiant aura erupting skyward, like a sun plummeting into rivers, clearly exceeded him both in quality and quantity!
This indicated, the opponent’s martial arts realm,
surpassed his own,
by yet another level?!!!
How is this possible!
The lamb he initially thought could be casually slaughtered, in this moment unexpectedly transformed into a fierce tiger!
"This battle, ends here..."
In the clear voice, Li Hu made his move.
Qiankun Heaven and Earth: Hongtian Dream!

chapters.title: Chapter 348 - 019 Hongtian Dream
chapters.content:
Chapter 348: Chapter 019 Hongtian Dream
Since the Gate of Truth underwent its mutation, Li Hu has been in this world for ten years now.
In ten years, with an exceedingly strong Spiritual Power, he has read through ninety-nine percent of the martial arts under heaven, merging ten thousand forms of martial arts into a single entity, forming Li Hu’s current Qiankun Dao above martial arts.
Qiankun, the universe, encompassing all life within it.
The one path of Qiankun is the road where all paths converge.
And Hongtian Dream is the most brilliant crystallization condensed from Li Hu’s Qiankun essence, which embodies tens of thousands of martial arts in his being!
The mere initial stance is enough to send a chill straight into Jue Wutian’s heart, as if his heart was plunged into an icy cave, feeling boundless coldness surging into his mind!
Jue Wutian, bearing the name of being without heaven.
If heaven opposes me, I must defy heaven.
One can imagine the arrogance in his heart!
Yet at this moment, Jue Wutian felt an inexplicable surge of terror, an unprecedented fear. Even when facing the Celestial Sword Elder’s elusive intent in the past, he had only felt a significant threat, but never such heartfelt dread!
With Li Hu’s strike, an indescribable sensation descended.
A clear, moon-like mysterious light emerged from the void, illuminating the sky for miles around.
The dust in the air, the whirling wind currents, the caterpillar on the treetop, the collapsing stones, the cocoon in the soil... everything was frozen in this instant.
Space-time stood still, and everything was fixed together, as if transformed into a solidified scene.
"What is that!!!"
Even martial artists hundreds of feet away were stunned in horror.
Space seemed to be compressed together, and countless details poured into everyone’s eyes. The leaves frozen in midair, the dust swirling around, the collapsing ruins, everything seemed to occur right in front of them. The influx of information almost caused everyone a splitting headache.
This was a spreading, pervading solidified world, a dead space.
All colors, all sounds, and all Life Force were stripped away in this moment.
It was incomprehensible, even unimaginable. Even if witnessed firsthand, one could not describe with words the bizarre scenes.
If earlier, Li Hu’s overwhelming aura stirred up the heavens and void, commanding the thunder and heavenly punishment, and using the laws of all things, such incredible methods might still be guessed based on one’s own martial arts foundation,
then the current heavenly immortal-like methods left even a Grandmaster with no basis for understanding, as if they were dreamlike, fantastical techniques only achievable in dreams.
Fearful, terrifying!
All the spaces and materials swept by the mysterious light felt as though they were being ensnared in a painting, that surreal sense of reality filled everyone’s eyes, blurring the line between illusion and reality, leaving people lost in this power.
The crowd watching from afar already felt an impending catastrophe from which they couldn’t escape, a calamity they couldn’t avoid.
Facing this move directly, Jue Wutian felt an innate dread.
He could not block it!
Not to mention the opponent’s martial arts cultivation was a whole tier above his own, this inexplicable and boundless method was utterly incomprehensible.
Hongtian Dream, a fleeting dream.
The surrounding void, all materials, were drawn into the fixed scene, then transformed into nothingness.
Large chunks of houses were solidified in the painting, a sense of existence had completely vanished, as if materials existing in reality were erased by an invisible hand, leaving only an immense and hollow scene!
This technique is already comparable to a Celestial Emperor and otherworldly power!
"Netherworld Devouring Heaven!!!"
As that terrifying scene spread, Jue Wutian unleashed the most powerful force of his life.
How could he die here like this!
In his heart, whether or not Jue Wutian regretted the hunt this time was unknown to others, but now, Li Hu’s power far exceeded his imagination, leaving only the desperate struggle as his only sliver of hope!
Endless power surged forth, creating a massive void vortex with immense attraction, even space seemed to be drawn in and absorbed.
Far outside the small town hundreds of feet away, those martial artists below the Innate level were involuntarily drawn toward the dark vortex under this incomparable force.
"No! Retreat quickly!"
Some martial artists awoke in terror, scrambling to retreat.
But in their haste, dozens to hundreds of martial artists below the Innate Level were absorbed by that massive dark vortex, shattered into a mass of flesh mid-air, and swirled into the dark vortex of Jue Wutian.
The void trembled, rippling with black waves.
The black hole that devoured the Life Essence of dozens to hundreds of people grew stronger as if evolving into a black sun god wheel slowly rising from the ocean, devouring everything between the void!
At this moment, the fixed scene of Hongtian Dream had reached before Jue Wutian’s eyes.
Splash!
A sound as clear as flowing water echoed between the void, and that power which seemed to draw everything in reality into a Dream World had spread and enshrouded that massive black hole vortex.
The downfall had begun.
The black sun god wheel, which had gathered the Life Essence of dozens to hundreds of martial artists, was like falling into a black abyss. Under the dreamy mysterious light filled with surrealism, it slowly sank into virtual oblivion, drawn into the fixed solidified scene as if trapped in an endless dream.
In merely a few breaths, that black sun god wheel emitting terrifying waves had already sunk into the illusory dream, fixed in that solidified, illusory mysterious light.
Despite the darkness and depth of the black hole vortex, anyone who saw it could sense it.
Its power had already perished!
But ultimately, Jue Wutian’s desperate resistance played a role.
After swallowing the black sun god wheel, the spreading mysterious light stopped at last, that supreme martial essence of Hongtian Dream had already expanded to its limit.
Time stood frozen for a moment.
The next moment, the fixed space collapsed with a booming sound!
This was a collapse beyond verbal description, the world fixed in Hongtian Dream disappeared in large swaths, whether it was the crumbling ruins, the dirt and earth, or the surrounding trees, all vanished into oblivion like a dream collapsing.
In mere moments, that fixed world had vanished completely, as if someone used an eraser to wipe clean everything from the void scene.
Transforming into a vast expanse of whiteness.
The unknown small town vanished entirely, leaving only a massive crater in its place.
Fortunately, during the previous series of battles, the people in the town had already scattered completely.
Otherwise, they would have already been obliterated in the terrifying aftermath.

chapters.title: Chapter 349 - 020 After the Battle
chapters.content:
Chapter 349: Chapter 020 After the Battle
Outside the nameless town, the air was deathly still.
All the martial artists around were staring blankly at the massive crater before them, mouths agape in shock, minds in a haze, feeling that everything that had transpired earlier had completely overturned the worldview of all the martial artists present.
Whether it was Jue Wutian’s Netherworld Divine Skill at the twelfth layer or Li Hu’s command over the Celestial Punishment Thunder, drawing space into a void-like dream, it all made each martial artist feel the peak of martial arts and that unbelievable power.
If they hadn’t witnessed it with their own eyes, no one would have believed such mythical feats existed in this world.
If prior to this, someone had described the details of such a battle to them, they would have thought the person was a madman.
"Did he escape..."
At this moment, hovering in the void above the massive crater, Li Hu’s body emanated ripples as his robe fluttered in the wind, like an immortal god descending upon the mortal realm.
His gaze swept indifferently across the empty void before him, where the Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian had long since vanished, evidently having fled during the collapse of the Hongtian Dream that had drawn him into the illusionary realm.
Li Hu had no intention of pursuing him.
Ten years ago, when he arrived in this world, Jue Wutian was a grandmaster and had already been defeated and gone into seclusion.
And ten years later, he had reached the pinnacle of martial arts, with the Celestial Human Realm within sight, while Jue Wutian had only taken a small step beyond being a grandmaster.
Such a person posed no threat to Li Hu.
Or rather, if at some point in the future, Jue Wutian could bring him some surprises, it would be even better.
This world had no path to shatter the void, and even the Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor who had opened up great paths had long since perished in the river of time.
Li Hu may not have the immense talent needed to create a new path on his own.
At that time, he may need to rely on the geniuses of this world to test some of his martial arts.
Thus, Li Hu no longer lingered, his form rippling with visible waves as he gradually dissipated like ink dissolved in clean water.
At the original site of the nameless town, only that colossal circular crater remained, drawn into illusion by the Hongtian Dream, now collapsed and shattered into void.
The surrounding martial artists, gazing at the empty crater before them, felt as though they had woken from a grand dream.
"Jue Wutian’s strength has increased again, ten years ago, when he faced the Celestial Sword Elder with a single sword, he had not reached this level, this time it seems he has indeed broken into the twelfth layer of Netherworld Divine Skill, after ten years, he’s back in the martial world, probably to duel the Celestial Sword Elder once more."
"Indeed, the Netherworld Divine Skill at the twelfth layer is a realm of unprecedented and never-to-be-seen-again, truly worthy of the astonishingly talented Demon Sect Leader."
"But, he was defeated, defeated by an even more talented and monstrous figure."
"Yes, with such martial arts cultivation, even the Celestial Sword Elder might not be able to compare to that person, the title of the world’s number one is likely to change hands now."
"Let’s go, let’s go, what does this have to do with me? Being born in the same era as such a prodigious talent is really disheartening..."
After a while, whispers of astonishment filled the air among the surrounding martial artists.
Some left in shame, some cautiously approached the crater to investigate, some stood dazed on the spot, eyes blank.
The reactions of everyone varied.
But no matter what, the battle between these two pinnacle figures of martial arts undoubtedly left a deep imprint in the hearts of every martial artist.
...
Within just a few days, the massive battle outside Xiangyun City spread throughout the world.
This time, it was even more intense than Li Hu’s sudden appearance three years ago.
Because Li Hu’s opponent was the most feared nightmare of the Central Plains’ righteous martial arts — the Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian!
Although ten years ago, the Celestial Sword Elder defeated Jue Wutian on Dongting Lake, halting the Demon Sect’s northward invasion.
But anyone could see that compared to the already aging Celestial Sword Elder, who dwelled in the southern Demon Cave, the young and vigorous Demon Sect Leader Jue Wutian posed a greater threat.
Without the support of his cultivation, the Celestial Sword Elder would be nothing more than an old man in his twilight years.
Even though he relied on deep cultivation for support, how much longer could he last?
In any case, it won’t be longer than Jue Wutian.
And once the Celestial Sword Elder passes, in the Central Plains Martial Arts, who could uphold the banner of righteousness to withstand the Demon Sect’s offensive?
For the past ten years, the threat of the southern Demon Sect has been like a guillotine hanging overhead, ready to fall at any moment!
Jue Wutian’s name constantly preoccupied the Heart Spirit of the Central Plains’ righteous martial arts.
Three years ago, when Li Hu suddenly emerged, many Central Plains martial artists viewed him as the successor of righteousness, a mainstay against the Demon Sect’s northern invasion, especially after he killed a Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable with one strike.
Unfortunately, since that stunning appearance three years ago, Li Hu’s trail had completely vanished, as if he never existed in this world.
Some believed Li Hu didn’t possess grandmaster-level combat power, and that the Cyan Dragon Demon Venerable’s death was merely a calculated assassination. Some think Li Hu had offended the Demon Sect, posing a huge threat, and was secretly killed by Jue Wutian during his seclusion.
Under such unforeseen circumstances, the battle outside Xiangyun City almost overturned everyone’s perception.
Nobody anticipated that, after ten years in seclusion, Jue Wutian would emerge, with an even greater martial arts cultivation.
And even more unexpected, despite his significant increase in strength, Jue Wutian suffered an unprecedented defeat against Li Hu, forcing the proud Jue Wutian to flee in disgrace.
The details circulating from the battle, including the method of silently erasing an entire town from existence, made every martial artist who heard it feel like they were listening to a mythical story.
If not for the fact that many martial artists witnessed the battle firsthand, anyone would have considered it a madman’s delusion.
Especially when a certain old grandmaster present at a banquet got drunk, someone seized the opportunity to ask, and in drunken envy, the old grandmaster replied with a cryptic line: "Heavens beyond heaven, people beyond people."
This comment further solidified the account of that battle.
A once-in-a-decade battle sensationalized the world,
from then on, the name Li Hu became known by everyone in the world.
He subtly surpassed the Celestial Sword Elder, being hailed as the world’s greatest master.
His exploits became a living martial arts legend in the mouths of wanderers in Jianghu.

chapters.title: Chapter 350 - 021: Dao Rhythm
chapters.content:
Chapter 350: Chapter 021: Dao Rhythm
Li Hu, who reappeared before the people of the Martial World, was as formidable as three years ago; whenever he took action, it would shock the entire world.
The Martial World was in turmoil because of the battle outside Xiangyun City, stirring countless undercurrents and storms.
It can be said that although Li Hu only appeared twice in the eyes of the people, each appearance stirred significant storms in the Martial World, gathering all worldly eyes upon him.
Admiration, melancholy, determination, everyone who heard of Li Hu’s deeds felt an endless stream of emotions within.
However, the external storms had little influence on Li Hu, and he felt no need to pay attention.
It had been nearly ten years since he came to this Martial Arts World.
In ten years, he spent most of his time cultivating and reading, even when Zhang Feng, suspected to be the protagonist of the Celestial Essence Sect, appeared before him, he had no desire to participate in the "plot".
Although he didn’t know what strange change occurred beyond the Gate of Truth, Li Hu was very clear that his coming to this world was only accidental, and he was just a passerby in the Martial World.
His foundation, his everything remained in the Main World.
From beginning to end, his goal was to shatter the void, relying on the Gate of Truth above his soul to return to the body of the Giant Dragon.
Having defeated the mysterious Jue Wutian, Li Hu did not linger, directly delving deeper into the Desolate Mountain Range.
Although Jue Wutian fled, he was severely injured by that strike, dead or heavily wounded, naturally without the strength or willingness to trouble Li Hu again.
There were no more obstacles on the way.
"Shattering the void, finally seeing a glimmer of insight..."
In the lush forest, Li Hu traversed the dense woods, his vast Spiritual Power scanning around while pondering the gains from the previous battle with Jue Wutian.
Great gains indeed.
Although he had records of the Netherworld Divine Skill, he had not cultivated it, naturally unaware of the true power after breaking through to the Twelfth Layer.
This battle with Jue Wutian not only allowed Li Hu to see another form of Martial Arts, but it also sparked more ideas.
Especially the collision of those two moves, which caused even the void to crack.
Though far from breaking the void, it was like a tightly closed door revealing a slight crack, seeing a thread of insight.
At that moment, the Gate of Truth deep within his soul clearly stirred, the fierce worldly binding force slightly loosened, making Li Hu more certain that shattering the void was the method to return to the Main World.
"Devour, compress, the extreme of Power..."
Some thoughts that never existed before began to emerge from his mind.
This battle with the pinnacle of Martial Arts gave him particularly substantial insights.
At Li Hu’s level, progressing on his own path was difficult, the high-level opponents provided him with much inspiration.
"Significant gains, although not enough to immediately break the Grandmaster bottleneck and enter the true pinnacle of Martial Arts, the Celestial Human Realm, I already have a premonition that as long as I find that ancient mysterious stone, it will allow me to smoothly enter the Celestial Human Realm."
Back then, the Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor discussed under Purple Bamboo Mountain.
The mysterious stone arrived through space-time, the Martial Ancestor studied it for seven days and nights, thus founding the Martial Arts of this world.
It can be said, all Martial Arts in this world originate from that mysterious stone.
Li Hu held more than ninety-nine percent of the Martial Arts in the world, understood tens of thousands of Martial Arts Secret Manuals, comprehending most of the mysteries from start to end of Martial Arts Qi Cultivation.
But ultimately, he lacked that final thread, yet to achieve Perfection.
Thus, he stood before the Celestial Human Gate without progress.
Li Hu knew clearly what he lacked, and where his opportunity to break the barriers lay.
If he could trace back to ancient origins, witness the first ray of Martial Arts glory, it would be the moment Li Hu achieved Martial Arts Perfection, breaking into the Celestial Human Realm.
Li Hu traversed step by step among the mountains and forests on his journey.
Each step was measured with precision.
Spiritual Power scanned constantly around.
Time passed in a flash, in the blink of an eye seven days and nights had passed.
During these seven days and nights, Li Hu kept walking,
without a moment of pause.
No need for sleep, food, water, nor rest.
His aura brimmed, ethereal like an Immortal, without a speck of dust.
He had a sense akin to those who feed on Qi and are immortal.
Martial Arts reached divine precision, at his level, viewed as deities by ordinary people was not an exaggeration.
Finally, at the end of the seventh night.
As dawn broke, Li Hu followed the guidance of the Celestial Secret and arrived at a cliff-enclosed valley.
Clouds shrouded it, towering cliffs!
This was likely the valley reached by the fortunate hunter who obtained the Martial Arts Origin Scripture.
According to legend, the Martial Arts Origin Scripture recorded by Guan Yinzi was half destroyed by purple lightning, but its final whereabouts were not detailed.
Now possessing the Martial Arts Origin Scripture, Li Hu’s keen eyesight recognized the possibility that the ancient manuscript might be the original struck by celestial lightning in Guan Yinzi’s hands.
Combined with the hunter’s account, that place contained both the book and a peculiar stone.
Li Hu speculated that after the Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor departed Purple Bamboo Mountain, Guan Yinzi, upon leaving with the Dao Ancestor, placed the damaged Martial Arts Origin Scripture beside the mysterious stone.
Chronicles of time, sea changes.
The Purple Bamboo Mountain had vanished without trace, the mysterious stone and Martial Arts Origin Scripture remained hidden within the layered mountains, coming into the world today.
"It should be here."
Feeling the vibrant and eager Spiritual Mechanism within his body, Li Hu did not pause, stepping into the valley as though traversing the void.
Clean, serene.
A lush purple bamboo stood, a small stream encircled it, making clear sounds.
Under the purple bamboo were two timeless mats, spotless as if time had frozen there.
And atop the mats lay a stone filled with mysterious patterns, half buried in the soil.
Upon entering the valley, Li Hu knew he had come to the right place.
Here, it likely was the site where the Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor sat and discussed the Dao.
Above the mats, the stone filled with mysterious patterns was indeed that mysterious stone!
The entire valley was permeated with an enigmatic and indescribable aura of Dao and Celestial Secret.
Even at the peak of worldly Martial Arts, Li Hu still felt an incomprehensible mystery in the face of this Dao essence.
It was this pervasive aura that allowed the valley to remain untouched by thousands of years, unchanged from yesterday.
"Celestial Human..."
Li Hu pondered,
The aura between voids not only made him feel his gaze traversing time-space, as if witnessing the image of two great Dao sages sitting and discussing the Dao in days gone by!

chapters.title: Chapter 351 - 022: Advancement to Celestial Being
chapters.content:
Chapter 351: Chapter 022: Advancement to Celestial Being
The Dao’s resonance has spread for millennia, still lingering and unchanged, preserving this unnamed valley through thousands of years.
Standing here, Li Hu could almost see in a daze,
the scene of Dao Ancestor and Martial Ancestor sitting and discussing Dao thousands of years ago.
This kind of technique, as if engraved in time, made Li Hu recall a certain realm in the Main World—Epic!
According to rumors, epic-level strong ones possess the ability to leave traces of their existence in time.
The realm of Martial Ancestor and Dao Ancestor is beyond Li Hu’s understanding, but the scene before him clearly holds the power of an Epic.
"Celestial Being...."
Back then, the Martial Ancestor and Dao Ancestor, their Martial Arts realm perhaps surpassed even Celestial Beings!
Yet, whether they are Celestial Beings or not, time flows on like this.
As thousands of years wash away, traces of those two ultimately disappeared from this world, lost in vast history.
Time is vast, eternal life remains elusive.
This journey, who knows when it will reach its end?
If he is not of this world, once cultivation reaches the realm of invincibility, with no rivals in sight, will he still seek a path to climb even higher?
At that time, will he also have the question within:
A lifetime of cultivation, for what purpose?
With a sigh, Li Hu casts away that fleeting feeling in his heart.
This emotion is the tribulation of the Dao heart naturally occurring when a martial artist cultivates to a certain realm.
Facing the passage of time, witnessing friends and family eventually passing away, being alone at the peak, surrounded by unfamiliar faces, when the world no longer relates to him, a deep sense of loneliness will fill his heart’s every corner, dragging him into the abyss of death.
If one cannot emerge from this twilight state of mind, even if lifespan far from its limit, the soul would perish in the twilight.
Thus Li Hu arrived at the valley where once Martial Ancestor and Dao Ancestor discussed Dao, seeing the Dao resonance filling the space, triggering the Dao heart tribulation.
However, compared to other martial artists in this world, Li Hu is not from this world.
He is more aware of the vastness beyond this world, its endless wonder, unable to fully explore even in a lifetime.
Moreover, Li Hu’s foundation is not rooted in this world, but in the distant Main World where he spent massive effort.
Consequently, the terrifying tribulation of the Dao heart for any cultivator only brings Li Hu momentary sadness, then vanishes.
Unaware he passed a Martial Arts hurdle, Li Hu’s gaze gathers on the celestial stone ahead.
Thousands of years ago, it was this celestial stone descending that opened the Martial Arts path in this world.
Li Hu stands firmly in place.
Ahead, suddenly divine patterns on the celestial stone begin to shine.
In a trance, it seemed to pull Li Hu’s spirit into a vast boundless heaven.
As if the Great Dao manifests,
during ten years in this world, the ten thousand volumes he’s read swiftly surface before his eyes.
From Refining Essence and Qi begins the Martial Arts path, to wielding divine might at the Grandmaster pinnacle.
In his eyes, each unfolds without any secrets.
Time, passing day by day.
On Li Hu, an indescribable transformation is taking place.
If someone were here, they’d see, upon entering the Deserted Valley, Li Hu’s energy was high but still within human scope.
But now, his aura and even his presence are like turning ethereal, blending into the earthly void.
The person is clearly before him, yet seems separated by a space, a world.
As if the person is gradually stepping to transcend beyond heaven and earth.
On the seventh day,
the sky is somber, rain falls steadily.
Between mountains, the clear sound of rain falling echoes.
Li Hu stands in the Deserted Valley, slowly lifts his head, and opens the eyes closed for seven days and nights.
The star-like radiant eyes gaze at the sky as if reflecting the entire world.
Rustle!
The clear splashes sound, rain curtain rolls heavenward, as if obeying his command, daring not touch his face.
"No ancients seen before, nor followers after, thinking of the vast universe, alone evokes tears...."
Since the start of Qi Cultivation on the Martial Arts path, in thousands of years past, countless people have climbed the peak, but how many have broken through the summit spanning Martial Arts, reaching its limits?
At this moment, Li Hu’s aura has completed its transformation.
The rain in the sky stopped.
The clouds dispersed.
The rising sun floods the world with morning light.
On Li Hu, yin and yang, light and dark, right and wrong, all concepts seem to vanish.
This is the supreme Martial Arts realm, completely above all in the world.
Celestial Being!
At this moment, all secrets in the river of Martial Arts are clear before his eyes.
This represents the most splendid blossom of Martial Arts in this world.
"Celestial Being, has completely reached the pinnacle of Martial Arts in this world."
